      .<app><lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ja1 #edh">aduve</lem>
      1030 <rdg wit="#ma1 #edj" cause="lexical">adr̥ve</rdg>
      .</app> kavula, <app><lem wit="#le1 #le2 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh">deniṅ</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le3">dene</rdg>
      .</app> patine kavulane,
      .<app><lem wit="#le1 #le2 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh">tan vənaṅ</lem>
      1035 <rdg wit="#le3">ikā tan vənaṅ</rdg>
      .</app> kaṅ
      .<app><lem wit="#le1 #le3 #lo1 #edj #edh">aṅupah-upah</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le2">aṅupah</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#ma1">aṅupah-umaḥ</rdg>
      1040 <rdg wit="#ja1">aṅupah-upa</rdg>
      .</app>, yan vicaranən.
      .</p>
      .<!--
      .@@A (le1): Ana voṅ apəpəgatan alaki-harabi, papa§t· [SH] yakt(i)<f>niṁṅ apəpəgatan sacihnane,, sakṣi, haṅgəmpal pisisadulur ūjar i(ṁ) laki, haveḥ (bañ)u ra(h)up· [2v2] , haveḥ vija bras·, Iku ta L̥viḥ pinakacihna yaktiniṅ apəpəgatan·, sidḍa hatadin hara[SH]ne, yenora yaktine papat iku, dudu tadin harane, duruṁ pəgat uga palaki-rabine, hana: po [2v3] voṁ vadon maṅka:na, tan pacihna hapəpəgatan·, tumuli halaki riṅ len·, kaṅ haṅalap· [SH] ḍəṇḍanən pataṁ lakṣa de saṁ hamava bhūmi ,, 0 ,,
      1045@@B (le2): hana voṁṅ apəpəgatan alaki harabi, [02-16]papat· yaktiniṁṅ apəpәgatan·, ci<add place="above">ḥ</add>ṇnane, sakṣi, haṅgəmpal pi- [02-17]sis a:ḍulūrran jar iṁ laki, haveḥ bañu rahup·, haveḥ vija bras· [02-18]hiku ta L̥viḥ pinakacihna-yaktin<subst><del rend="corrected">ә</del><add place="overstrike">i</add></subst>ṅ apəpәg<del>ta</del>a<add place="above">ta</add>n·, sidda hatadi- [02-19]n harane, yen ora na yaktine papat iku, dudu tadin ha:rane, [02-20]duruṁ pgat uga paphaki-rabine,, hapan voṁ vadon maṅkana haci<add place="above">ḥ</add>ṇna ha- [02-21]pəpgatan·, tumuli halaki ri len·, kaṅ haṅalap ḍəṇḍanən pataṁ la- [02-22]<margin hand="roman">6</margin>kṣa de saṁ hamava bhūmi ,, 0 ,,
      .@@C (le3): [24-12]hana voṁṅ apəpəgatan alaki harabi, papat· yakti- ⌈ [24-13]ne riṁṅ apəpәgatan·, cihnane. saksi, haṅgəmpal pisi- [24-14]s·, hadulur hujariṁ laki, haveḥ bañu rahup·, ha- ⌈ [24-15]veḥ vija bras·, hika ta L̥viḥ <subst><del rend="corrected">m</del><add place="overstrike">p</add></subst>inakacihna-yaktiniṁṅ a- [24-16]pəpәgatan·, sidḍa hatadin harane,, yen ora ṇa yakṭi- [24-17]ne papat iku, dudu tadin iku harane, duruṁ pgat uga pha- [24-18]laki-rabine,, hana po voṁ vadon maṅkana:, tan paci- [24-19]hna hapəpgatan·, tumuli halaki len·, kaṅ haṅa- [24-20]lap· ḍəṇḍanən pataṁ lakṣa denira saṁṅ amava bhūmi ,, 0 ,,
      .@@L (lo1): hana voṁ hapəpəgatan alakī harabi, papat· yaktiniṁ hapəpga:tan·, cihnane, sakṣī, haṅgəṅgəmpal pisis hadulur hujar riṁ laki, haveḥ bañu ra- [6v4]vup·, haveḥ vija bras· Iku ta: L̥viḥ pinaka:cihna-yaktīniṁ hapəpgatan·, śiḍa: hatadin harane,, yen ora na: yakṭine papat iku, dudu tadin harane, duruṁ pgat uga phalaki-rabine,, hana po voṁ vadon maṅkaṇa:, tan pacihna hapəpgatan·, tumuli halaki riṁ len·, kaṅ ha:ṅalap· ḍəṇḍanən pataṁ [7r2]lakṣa: de saṅ amava bhūmī
      .@@M (ma1): hana voṁ apəpəgatan alakiharabī, papat· yaktiniṅ apepega[SH]tan·, cihnane, sakṣi, haṅgəmpal pisis adulur ujar iṁ lakī, haveḥ bañu ra[3v2]hup·, haveḥ vija bras·, hiku ta L̥viḥ pinakacihna yaktīniṅ apəpəgatan·, sidḍa ha[SH]tadin harane, yenorana yaktīne papat īka, dudu tadin harane, dūrūṁ pə[3v3]gat uga palakirabine,, hana po voṁ vadon maṅkana, tan pacihna hapəpəgatan·, tumuli [SH] halaki riṁ len·, kaṅ aṅhalap· ḍəṇḍanen pataṁ lakṣa denira saṁ a:mava bumī [3v4],, 0 ,,
      .@@X (ja1): hana voṁ hapəpətan alaki harabi, papat· yaktiniṁ hapəpgatan·, ci- [01r-14]ṇane sakṣi haṅgəmpalakәn pisis adurr ujariṁ laki, haveḥ bañu ra- [01r-15]vup·, haveḥ hvija: bras· hiku ta L̥viḥ pinakaṁ cina-yaktiniṁ [01r-16]hapəpәgatan·, sida hatadin· harane, yen ora na yakti [01r-17]papat iku, ḍuḍu tadin· harane, duruṁ pgat uga malaki-rabi- ⌈ [01r-18]ne tani ,, 0 ,, [01r-19]hana po voṁ vadon· maṅkaṇa: tan pacina hapəpәtan·, tu- [01r-20]muli halaki riṁ len·, kaṅ a:ṅalap·, ḍəṇḍanən pataṁ lakṣa deni- [01r-21]ra saṅ amava bhūmi ,, 0 ,,
      1050@@J (edJ): hana voṅ apəpəgatan alakiarabi, papat yaktiniṅ pəpəgatan, cihnane: sākṣi, aṅgəmpal pisis sadulur ujariṅ laki, aveh bañu rahup, aveh vija bras, iku ta ləvih pinakacihna yaktiniṅ apəpəgatan. siddha atadin arane, yen nora hana yaktine papat iku, dudu tadin arane, duruṅ pəgat uga palakirabine, hana po voṅ vadon maṅkana, tan pacihna apəpəgatan, tumuli alaki riṅ len, kaṅ aṅalap, ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhumi.
      .@@H (edH): hana voṅ apəpəgatan alaki-arabi, papat yaktiniṅ apəpəgatan, cihnane, sākṣi, aṅgəmpal pisis sadulur ujariṅ laki, aveh bañu rahup, aveh vija bras, iku ta ləvih pinakacihna yaktiniṅ apəpəgatan, siddha atadin arane, yen nora hana yaktine papat iku, dudu tadin arane, duruṅ pəgat uga palaki-rabine, hana po voṅ vadon maṅkana, tan pacihna apəpəgatan, tumuli alaki riṅ len, kaṅ aṅalap ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhumi.
      .-->

      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="5">hana voṅ
      .<app><lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">apəpəgatan</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#ja1">apəpətan</rdg>
      1075</app> alaki arabi,
      . papat
      .<app><lem wit="#le2 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edh">yaktiniṅ apəpəgatan, cihnane</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#le1">yaktiniṅ apəpəgatan sacihnane</rdg>
      .<rdg wit="#le3">yaktine riṅ apəpәgatan, cihnane</rdg>
      1080<rdg wit="#edj">yaktiniṅ pәpәgatan, cihnane</rdg>
      .<!-- ᬧᬧᭂᬕᬢᬦ᭄ᬲᬘᬶᬳ᭄ᬦᬦᬾ
      . ᬳᬧᭂᬧᭂᬕᬢᬦ᭄᭞ᬘᬶᬳ᭄ᬦᬦᬾ
      .-->
      .</app>,
      1085 sākṣi, <app><lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #ma1 #edj #edh">aṅgəmpal</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#lo1">aṅgəṅgəmpal</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#ja1">aṅgəmpalakәn</rdg>
      .</app> <app><lem wit="#le1 #ma1 #edj #edh">pisis sadulur ujar</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#le2">pisisāḍulūrranjar</rdg>
      1090<rdg wit="#le3 #lo1">pisis hadulur</rdg>
      .<rdg wit="#ja1">pisisadurrujar</rdg>
      .</app> iṅ laki,
      . aveh bañu rahup, aveh vija bras,
      . iku ta ləvih pinakacihna yaktiniṅ apəpəgatan,
      1095 siddha atadin arane,
      . yen nora hana yaktine papat iku,
      . dudu tadin arane, duruṅ pəgat uga palaki-rabine, hana po voṅ vadon maṅkana, tan pacihna apəpəgatan, tumuli alaki
      .riṅ len, kaṅ aṅalap, ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      1100<!--
      .A (le1): hana voṁ harusak titipan·, yaktine, den{*}·-bukti de[2v4]n-aṅgo, den-salini rupa, tan pamit riṁ kaṅ adr̥ve titipan·, hika ta vnaṁ haranana vala[SH]t·, tikahe pada kalavan sabda rinusak·, saguṅ iṁ paR̥gani (t)itipan palukudən den-mulihanikəlya, [3r1] mariṅ kaṅ atitip·, tur ḍəṇda:nən· roṁ lakṣa, denira saṅ amava bumi, kaliṅaniṅ arusak titi[SH]pan paḍa kalavan maliṁ ,, 0 ,,
      .
      .B (le2): Ana voṁ haṅrusak titipan·, yaktine, den-bukti, den-a:ṅgo, [02-24]den-salini rupa, tan pamit iṅ kaṅ adr̥vye titipan·, Ika ta [02-25]vnaṁ haranana valat·. tiṅkahe paḍa kalava:n saṇḍa: rinusak·, [03-01]saguṁṅṅ iṁ paṁR̥ga:niṁ titipan palakunən den-mulihanikəl·, mariṁ kaṅ ati- [03-02]tip·, tūr ḍəṇḍanən roṁ lakṣa denira saṅ hamava bhūmī, kaliṅhaniṁṅ ṅhaṅrusa- [03-03]<margin hand="roman">7</margin>k titipan paḍ<del>ḍa</del>a lavan mal<del>la</del>iṁ,, 0 ,,
      .
      1105C (le3): hana voṅ aṅrusak titipan·, yaktine, denbukti, de- [30-18]n-aṅgo, densalini rupa:, tan pamit iṅ kaṅ adr̥ve titi- [30-19]pan·, hiku ta vnaṁ haranana valat·, tiṅkahe paḍa lan aṁ- [30-20] rusak saṇḍa:, saguṅiṁ paṁR̥ganiṁ titi<add place="above">pa</add>n· phalakunən de- [30-21]nmulih anikəl· mariṁ kaṅ a:titip·, tūr ḍəṇḍanən· ⌈ , [30-22]roṁ lakṣa denira saṁṅ amava bhūmi, kaliṅane haṅru- [30-23]sak titipan·, paḍa kalavan maliṁ ,, 0 ,,
      .
      .L (lo1): hana voṁ haṅrusak titipan·, yaktine, denbukṭī, denaṅgo, densalini rupa:, tan pamit iṁ kaṅ ha:dr̥ve titipan·, [7r3]hika: ta vnaṁ haranena va:lat,, tiṅkahe padḍa kalavan saṇḍa rinusak·, saguṅiṁ paṅr̥ganiṁ titipan· phalakunən denmulih anikəl·, mariṁ kaṅ ha:- [7r4]titip·, tūr ḍəṇḍanən roṁ lakṣa: denira saṅ ha:mava bhūmī, kaliṅaniṁ haṅrusak titipan· paḍo lavan maliṁ
      .
      .M (ma1): hana voṁ haṁrusak titipan·, yaktine den-buktī, den-aṅgo, {da}den-saleni rupa §[SH], tan pamit iṅ kaṅ adr̥ve titipan·, hika ta vnaṁ haranana valat·, tiṅkahe pada [4r1] lavan sanda rinusak·, saguṅ iṁ paṁR̥ga niṁ titipan palakunən·, den-mulihanikəl·, ma[SH]riṁ kaṅ atitip·, tūr ḍəṇḍanən· denira saṅ amava bhūmī, roṁ lakṣa, kaliṅaniṁ [4r2] haṁrusak titipan pada lavan maliṁ,, 0 ,,
      1110
      .X (ja1): hana voṁ haṅrusak titipan·, yaktine denbukti, den-aṅgo, [01r-23]densalini rupa:, tan amit ri kaṅ a:dr̥ve titipan·, hika ta vnaṁ ha-[02v-01]ranana valat·, tiṅkahe paḍa kalavan saṇḍa rinusak·, guṅiṁ dr̥ve R̥- [02v-02]niṁ titipan·, malakunən· den-ulih anikəl·, mariṁ kaṅ a:titip·, [02v-03]tūr <del rend="ui">ta</del>ḍəṇḍanən roṁ lakṣa denira saṅ a:mava bhumi, kaliṅane kaṅ aṅru- [02v-04]sak titipan·, paḍa kalavan maliṁ ,, 0 ,,
      .
      .J (edJ): hana voṅ aṅrusak titipan, yaktine den-bhukti, den-aṅgo, den-salini rupa, tan pamit riṅ kaṅ adr̥ve titipan, ikā ta vənaṅ aranana valat, tiṅkahe paḍa kalāvan saṇḍa rinusak, saguṅ iṅ paṅrəganiṅ titipan palakunən den-mulihanikəl mariṅ kaṅ atitip, tur ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi, kaliṅaniṅ aṅrusak titipan paḍa kalāvan maliṅ.
      .
      1115H (edH): ana voṅ aṅrusak titipan, yaktine, den-bukti, den-aṅgo, den-salini rupa, tanpa amit iṅ kaṅ adr̥ve titipan, ika ta vnaṅ aranana valat. tiṅkahe paḍa kalavan sanḍa rinusak, saguṅ iṅ paṅrəga niṅ titipan palakunən den-muli-anikəl, mariṅ kaṅ atitip, tur ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi, kaliṅaniṅ aṅrusak titipan paḍa kalavan maliṅ.
      .-->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="6">
      .(10) hana voṅ aṅrusak titipan, yaktine, den-bhukti, den-aṅgo, den-salini rupa, tan pamit <app>
      1120<lem>riṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#HH">iṅ</rdg>
      .</app> kaṅ adr̥ve titipan, ikā ta vənaṅ aranana valat, tiṅkahe paḍa kalavan saṇḍa rinusak, saguṅ iṅ paṅrəganiṅ titipan palakunən den-mulihanikəl mariṅ kaṅ atitip, tur ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, kaliṅaniṅ aṅrusak titipan paḍa kalavan maliṅ.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      1125A (le1): hana voṁ hamatenin kahulaniṁ voṁ, tan padosa ve/t·\niṁ səR̥ṅəne, kaṁṅ hamateni, kaṁ hamateni hamanavurana hutaṅe kaṁ den-pateni hika, mulihanikəl kaṅ amariṁ kaṅ adr̥/+ve\ kahula, tur haveḥha paṅəli\(n)/sava voluṅ untiṁ, Ika ka:hilaṅani doṣa, hamateni,, maniḥ hana voṁ hamateni voṁ tan padoṣa, dudu kavulaniṁ voṁ, savetniṁ saR̥ṅəne kaṅ amateni, yogya kaṅ amateni ḍəṇda:nən denira saṅ amava bumi, ḍənda voluṁ lakṣa, turr aveha paṅliṁ-sava, mariṁ sanakadaṁ-vargganiṁ mati, paṅli voluṁ tali ,, 0 ,,
      .
      .B (le2): Ana voṁ hamateni voṁ tan pa- [03-04]doṣa, vetiṁ śr̥ṅhəne kaṅ amateni, kaṅ amateni hamanahurana [03-05]hutaṁṅe kaṁ ḍ<del>ḍ</del>enpateni Ika, mulih a:nikəl mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve ka- [03-06]hula, tur aveha paṅli sava voluṁṅ untiṁ, Ika ka<subst><del rend="corrected">li</del><add place="overstrike">hi</add></subst>laṅhane doṣa- [03-07]ne hamateni,, manih ana voṅ amateni voṁ tan padoṣa, du- [03-08]dū kahulaniṁ voṁ, savetiṁ səR̥ṅəne, kaṅ amateni, yogya ka- [03-09]ṅ amateni hika ḍḍaṇḍanən denira saṅ amava bhūmi, ḍəṇḍa:nәn pa- [03-10]taṁ lakṣa, tūr aveha paṅli śava mariṁ sa<add place="above">na</add>kadaṁ varghaniṁ mati, volūṁ [03-11]<margin hand="roman">8</margin>talī,, 0 ,,
      .
      .C (le3): hana voṁ [04-12]ṅ amateni <del>na</del>kavulaniṁ voṁ tan padoṣa, vetiṁ sr̥ṅəne kaṁ hamateni<del>n</del>·, [04-13]<del>yen sacihna: sayakti, maṅkana liṅira saṁ paṇḍita</del>kaṅ amatenin manahura- [04-14]ṇa: hutaṅe kaṁ denpateni hika:, muliḥ hanikəl mariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve ka- [04-15]vula:, tūrr aveha pamәli śava voluṅ untiṁ, hika kahilaṅane doṣane, [04-16]hamateni<del>n</del>·,, 0,, maniḥ hana voṁṅ amatenin voṁ tan padoṣa, dudu kavu- [04-17]laniṁ voṁ, savetniṁ sr̥ṅəne kaṁ hamatenin·, yogya kaṅ amatenin hika: [04-18]ḍəṇḍanən denira saṁṅ amava bhūmi, ḍəṇḍane voluṁ lakṣa, turr aveḥha pamli [04-19]śava mariṁ sanakaḍaṁ varganiṁ mati paṅli ,, 0 ,,
      1130
      .L (lo1): hana voṁ hamateni kavulaniṁ voṁ, tan padośa:, vetiṁ səR̥ṅəne, kaṁ hamatenī,, kaṅ ha:matenī hamanavurana: hutaṅe kaṁ denpateni hika:, mulih anikəl· ma- [7v2]riṁ kaṅ ha:dr̥ve kavula:, tūrr aveha: paṅli sava: voluṅ uṇṭiṁ, hika: kahilaṅane dośane, hamateni,, 0,, manih ana voṁ hamatenī voṁ [7v3]tan padośa, dudu kavula:niṁ voṁ, savetiṁ səR̥ṅəne kaṅ amatenī, yogya kaṅ ha:mateni ḍəṇḍanən· denira saṅ ha:mava bhūmī, ḍəṇḍa pataṁ [7v4]lakṣa, tur aveha: paṅli sava:, mariṁ sanaka:ḍaṁ vargganiṁ matī, paṅli voluṁ talī
      .
      .M (ma1): hana voṁ hamateni kahulaniṁ voṁ tan padoṣa, v[SH]etiṁ səR̥ṅəne kaṅ amatenī, kaṅ amateni hamanahura/na\ vutaṅe kaṁ den-pate[4r3]ni hika:, /tur\ mulihanikə/l·\ mariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula, tūr aveha pamli-sava volūṁ huntiṁ, hika kahi[SH]laṅane doṣane hamateni,, maniḥ hana voṁ hamateni voṁ tan padoṣa, § [4r4] dudu kahulaniṁ voṁ, savetiṁ səR̥ṅəne ka/ṅ a\mateni, yogya kaṅ amateni hika: ḍaṇḍanə[SH]n denira saṅ amava bhumi, dənda pataṁ lakṣa, tūr aveha paṅl{ə}i-sava mariṁ sanakadaṁ var[4v1]gganiṁ matī, volūṁ tali,, 0 ,,
      .
      1135X (ja1): hana voṁ hamatyani ka:vulaniṁ voṁ, tan padoṣa vetniṁ səR̥ṅə- [02v-06]ne, kaṅ a:ma<del rend="ui">na</del>teni, hamanavurana hutaṅe kaṁ denpateni [02v-07]hika, mulih anikəl· mariṁ kaṅ a:dr̥ve kavula, turr ave paṅla sava [02v-08]voluṁṅ untiṁ, hika ka:hilaṅane doṣane hamateni,, 0,, [02v-09]maniḥ hana voṁ hamateni voṁ tan padoṣa dudu kavulaniṁ ⌈ [02v-10]voṁ, vetniṁ sr̥ṅəne kaṅ a:mateni, yogya kaṅ amateni ḍəṇḍa- [02v-11]nən· denira saṅ a:mava bhumi voluṁ lakṣa, tur haveha paṅli sa- [02v-12]va, mariṁ sanaka:daṁ vargga:niṁ mati paṅli sava, voluṁ talī ,, 0 ,,
      .
      .J (edJ): (11) hana voṅ amateni kavulaniṅ voṅ tan padoṣa vetniṅ sərəṅəne kaṅ amateni, kaṅ amateni amanahurana hutaṅe kaṅ den-pateni ikā, mulianikəl mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula, tur aveha paṅli-śava voluṅ untiṅ ika kahilaṅan iṅ doṣane amateni. (12) manih hana voṅ amateni voṅ tan padoṣa, dudu kavulaniṅ voṅ, savetniṅ sərəṅəne kaṅ amateni, yogya kaṅ amateni ḍəṇḍanən denira saṅ amava bhumi ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa, tur aveha paṅli-śava mariṅ sanak kadaṅ varganiṅ mati, paṅli voluṅ tali.
      .
      .H (edH): hana voṅ amateni kavulaniṅ voṅ tan padoṣa, vetiṅ sərəṅəne, kaṅ amateni. kaṅ amateni amanahurana hutaṅe kaṅ den-pateni ikā, mulianikəl mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula, tur aveha paṅli-śava voluṅ untiṅ, ika kahilaṅan iṅ doṣane amateni. (12) manih ana voṅ amateni voṅ tan padoṣa, dudu kavulaniṅ voṅ, savetiṅ sərəṅəne kaṅ amateni, yogya kaṅ amateni ḍəṇḍanən denira saṅ amava bhumi, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa, tur aveha paṅli-śava, mariṅ saṅkaḍaṅ varganiṅ mati, paṅli voluṅ tali.
      1140 -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="7">
      .(11) hana voṅ amateni kavulaniṅ voṅ tan padoṣa vetniṅ sərəṅəne kaṅ amateni, kaṅ amateni amanahurana hutaṅe kaṅ den-pateni ikā, mulianikəl mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula, tur aveha paṅli-śava voluṅ untiṅ ika kahilaṅan iṅ doṣane amateni. (12) manih hana voṅ amateni voṅ tan padoṣa, dudu kavulaniṅ voṅ, savetniṅ sərəṅəne kaṅ amateni, yogya kaṅ amateni ḍəṇḍanən denira saṅ amava bhūmi ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa, tur aveha paṅli-śava, mariṅ <app>
      .<lem>sanak kadaṅ varga</lem>
      1145<rdg wit="#J">sanakadaṅ-varga</rdg>
      .<rdg wit="#HH">saṅkadhaṅ-varga</rdg>
      .</app> niṅ mati, paṅli voluṅ tali.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      1150A (le1): /+hana voṅ a\dr̥ve [SH] titipan·, yen pine\t·/ denira saṅ amava bhumi, yeñ coloṅən deniṁ maliṁ, ye bahakən deni v[3v1]oṁ, yen katunon·, yen keliya riṅ bañu, yen hilaṅa katahura(g)·, den(iṁ)<f> guṅiṁ praṁ, tan· [SH] vnaṁ hiku palakunən denikaṅ atitip·, Apan kapañcasadarane , 0 ,
      .
      .B (le2): dr̥ve titipan· yen pi<add place="above">n</add>et denira saṅ amava bhūmi, [03-12]yen coloṁṅən deniṁ maliṁ, yen bahakən deniṁ voṁ,, yen katuno- [03-13]na, yen keliha riṁ bañu, yen hilaṅa katavura<del>na</del>g deniṁ guṅhiṁ praṁ, tan· [03-14]vnaṁ hika yen palakunən dene kaṅ atitip·, hapan kapañcasadara hara- [03-15]<margin hand="roman">9</margin>ne,, 0 ,,
      .
      .C (le3): belum ketemu (belum teridentifikasi pada catatan margin)
      1155
      .L (lo1): dr̥ve titīpan· yen pinet denira saṅ ha:mava: bhūmī, yen coloṅən deniṁ maliṁ,, yen bahakən deniṁ voṁ, yen katunona:, yen keliya: riṁ bañu, yen ilaṅa: kata:hurag ḍeniṁ guṅiṁ praṁ, tan vənaṁ hika palaku- [8r2]nən dene kaṅ ha:titip·, Apan kapañcasaḍaraṇa: harane
      .
      .M (ma1): dr̥ve titipan· yen pinet denira saṅ amava bhumi, /yen·\ cino[SH]loṁ deniṁ maliṁ, yen bahakən deniṁ voṁ, yen katuno/n·\na{·}, yen keliha riṁ ba[4v2]ñū, yen ilaṅa katavurag deniṁ guṅ iṁ praṁ, tan· vnaṁṅ ika yen· palakunən de kaṅ atitip·, Apa§[SH]n kapañcasada:raṇa harane,, 0 ,,

      1160X (ja1): dr̥ve titipan·, yen pinet denira saṅ amava bumi, yen co- [02v-14]loṅən deniṁ maliṁ, yen bahakən deniṁ vo yen katununon· ke- [02v-15]li ṅariṁ bañu, yen hilaṅ atahurat·, deniṁ guṅiṁ praṁ tan vənaṁ hika palaku- [02v-16]nən·, deniṁ kaṁṅ a:titi, <del rend="ui">pa</del>hapan kapa:ñcasaḍaraṇa harane,, 0 ,,
      .
      .J (edJ): hana voṅ adr̥ve titipan, denpinet denira saṅ amava bhumi, yen coloṅən deniṅ maliṅ, yen bahakən deniṅ voṅ, yen katunon. yen keliya riṅ bañu, yen hilaṅa katahurag deniṅ guṅ iṅ praṅ, tan vənaṅ iku palakunən deniṅ kaṅ atitip, apan kapañcasadharana arane.

      .H (edH): dr̥ve titipan, yen pinet denira saṅ amava bhumi, yen coloṅən deniṅ maliṅ, yen bahakən deniṅ voṅ, yen katunon. yen keliya riṅ banju, yen ilaṅa katahurag deniṅ guṅ iṅ praṅ, tan vənaṅ ika palakunən dene kaṅ atitip, apan kapañcasadharana arane.

      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="8">
      .(13) <app>
      .<lem>hana voṅ</lem>
      1170<rdg wit="#HH">
      .<gap reason="omitted"/>
      .</rdg>
      .</app>
      .<app>
      1175<lem>adr̥ve</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#HH">dr̥ve</rdg>
      .</app> titipan, <app>
      .<lem>yen</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#HH">den-</rdg>
      1180</app> pinet denira saṅ
      .amava bhūmi, yen co coloṅən deniṅ maliṅ, yen bahakən deniṅ voṅ, yen katunon. yen keliya riṅ bañu, yen hilaṅa katahurag deniṅ guṅ iṅ praṅ, tan vənaṅ iku palakunən <app>
      .<lem>deniṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#HH">dene</rdg>
      .</app> kaṅ atitip, apan kapañcasadharana arane.</p>
      1185<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      .
      .A (le1): riṁ voṁṅ ahuta pari, yen liva sakiṅ li[3v2]maṅ tahun tan hamanavuriṁ tumuli, hiṅane hanikəl piṁlima, hiku patəḥ-patəḥhe saṁ li hagama ,, 0 [SH] ,,
      .B (le2): riṁ voṁṅ ahutaṁ pari, yen tan hamanahuri tumuli, yen li- [03-16]vat sakiṁ limaṁ tahun·, hiṅane hanikəl piṁlima, Iku patəḥ-patə⌈- [03-17]<margin hand="roman">10</margin>he sakiṁ hagama,, 0 ,,
      1190C (le3): riṁ voṁṅ ahutaṁ pari yen tan amanahuri tumuli, [37-14]yen livat sakiṁ limaṁ tthahun·, hiṅane hanikəl piṁlima:, hiku [37-15]<margin hand="roman">104</margin>patəḥ-patəhe sakiṅ agama: ,, 0 ,,
      .L (lo1): riṁ voṁ havutaṁ parī yen tan hamanahurī tumulī, yen livat sakiṁ limaṁ tavun·, hi- [8r3]ṅane hanikəl piṁlima:, hiku patəḥ-patəhe sakiṁ hagama:. 0.
      .M (ma1): riṁ voṅ ha:hutaṁ pari, yen tan amanavura tumuli, § [4v3] yen livat sakiṁ limaṁ thahun·, hiṅane hanikəl paṁlima, hiku patəḥpatəhe sakiṁ hagama,, 0 ,,
      .X (ja1): riṁ voṁ hahutaṁ pari, yen tan pana:vura:n· tumuli, yen livat sa- [02v-18]kiṁ limaṁ tavun·, hiṅane hanikəl· piṁlima, hiku patəḥ-patəḥ- [02v-19]hane sakiṁ hagama:,, 0 ,,
      .J (edJ): riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ pari, yen tan amanahuri tumuli, yen livat sakiṅ limaṅ tahun hiṅane anikəl piṅlima, iku patəhpatəhe sakiṅ āgama.
      1195H (edH): riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ pari, yen tan amanahuri tumuli, yen livat sakiṅ limaṅ tahun, iṅane anikəl piṅlima, iku patəh-patəhe sakiṅ āgama.
      . -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="9">
      .riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ pari, yen tan amanahuri tumuli, yen livat sakiṅ limaṅ tahun hiṅane anikəl piṅlima, iku patəhpatəhe sakiṅ āgama.</p>
      1200<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      .
      . -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      1205<p n="10">
      .<app>
      .<lem>hana</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#HH">
      .<gap reason="omitted"/>
      1210</rdg>
      .</app> kavula vadon, yen miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, manihana kavula lanaṅ miṅgat sakiṅ gustine atəmu paḍa kavula niṅ voṅ riṅ paṅiṅgatan, alaki-arabi paḍa miṅgat alavas hana riṅ deśa len, akeh anake hana lanaṅ hana vadon, vəkasan kaluruh dene gustine kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon, dene kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ anake dumən mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ roṅ duman, mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon saduman. yen mati kaṅ lanaṅ karuhun, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon ameta pomah-omahe sasuhun, kavula vadon muliya mariṅ gustine manih. yen mati kaṅ vadon karuhun, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ ameta pomah-omahe sarəmbat, kavula lanaṅ muliha mariṅ gustine manih. sarəmbat sasuhun uga padumane, maṅkana ujar iṅ saṅ hyaṅ śāstre.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .
      . <!--
      1215
      . -->
      . <!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="11">
      .kavula vadon malər riṅ gustine, pinalaku deniṅ kavulaniṅ voṅ, yen palakunən deniṅ voṅ <app>
      1220<lem>tan kavulaniṅ voṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#HH">
      .<gap reason="omitted"/>
      .</rdg>
      .</app>, pinakarabine, vetniṅ harəpe riṅ kavula vadon ikā, anutakən <app>
      1225<lem>paṅavulaneniṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#HH">paṅavulaneriṅ</rdg>
      .</app> kavula vadon, sakehe anake sadr̥vene kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon uga visesa, vənaṅ ameta.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      1230
      . -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="12">
      .hana voṅ lanaṅ kavulaniṅ voṅ, arabi voṅ tan pahutaṅ, yen arabiha voṅ menak, <app>
      1235<lem>vuvus</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#HH">huvus</rdg>
      .</app> anak-anak ro, təlu, papat, lima. hanake, dr̥vene, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ viśeṣa, vənaṅ ameta, yen rabine voṅ menak, mon mati kavula lanaṅ ikā, kaṅ vadon menak kadumana anake satuṅgal kevala, maṅkana dharmane sakiṅ āgama.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      1240
      . -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .
      .<!--%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
      1245% Rest of Kuṭara-Mānava text based on Jonker 1885
      .% mechanically converted, corrected and normalized by Tim Lubin or Arlo Griffiths
      .%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%-->
      .
      .<p n="13">
      1250riṅ voṅ atitip dr̥ve riṅ voṅ tan panak-anak, yen atitipa dr̥ve riṅ voṅ anəluh, duruṅ den-palaku titipane ikā, kablət mati kaṅ den-titipi, nora kavaśa titipane ikā yen den-palakuha, anumpak iṅ paṅ akiṅ araniṅ dr̥ve, yen maṅkana.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      .
      . -->
      1255<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="14">
      .riṅ voṅ atatavan lavan rarā, den-siṅidakən riṅ alas, karakṣane, yen katəmu deniṅ bapaniṅ rarā, kaṅ anavanakən yogya amatenana voṅ atuvane rarā, yen katəmu karoronroron iṅ deśaha, yen iṅ rahina, nora vənaṅ patenana deniṅ voṅ-atuvaniṅ rarā ikā kaṅ anavanakən ikā, aṅiṅ dunuṅan iṅ atatavan ikā ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      1260
      . -->
      .
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="15">
      1265yen hana rare alit, duruṅ bhiṣa anambut gave aṅherṅher iṅ voṅ, ahutaṅ paṅan, bhaktadāsa arane, yen harəp iuṅhāha sakiṅ gənahe aṅher; mahu bhiṣa anambut gave luṅha karəpe, panahurane hutaṅ paṅan, voluṅ tali, riṅ kaṅ aṅiṅoni saṅkan alit ikā; maṅkana śāsana sakiṅ śāstra.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      .
      . -->
      1270<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="16">
      .yen hana voṅ añoloṅ parahuniṅ aparahu, dudu parahu nira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen parabu sarupane, kala rahina dene añoloṅ, ḍəṇḍanen salakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tur parahu kaṅ den-coloṅ ikā muliha anikəl samulene rəgane.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      1275
      . -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="17"> yen hana voṅ amalakekən rabiniṅ voṅ aṅundaṅ iṅ tuṅgale sapakaraman lavan kadaṅ-varganiṅ lanaṅ, kadaṅ-varganiṅ vadon paḍa den-undaṅ, iku voṅ amaraṅ laraṅan arane; kaṅ amalakekən ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa dene kaṅ adr̥ve rabi aṇḍəṇḍaha, kaṅ kinareb alaki-arabi, vənaṅ patenana karo ikā dene kaṅ adr̥ve rabi mula, yen amalaku iṅurip lanaṅe vadone, paḍa kaḍəṇḍaha amataṅ lakṣa; manih undaṅ-undaṅane sakehe kaṅ vəruh yen rabiniṅ voṅ kaṅ den-varaṅ ikā, kaḍəṇḍaha roṅ lakṣa riṅ voṅ satuṅgal-satuṅgal, tan vəruh yen laraṅan kaṅ den varaṅ ikā milu kondaṅ ḍəṇḍa salakṣa riṅ voṅ satuṅgalsatuṅgal, voṅ kaṅ
      .milu anambuṅ iṅ luṅguh, nora vəruh riṅ avadine kaḍəṇḍaba limaṅ tali riṅ voṅ satuṅgal-satuṅgal.</p>
      1280<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      .
      . -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      1285<p n="18"> hana ta voṅ-atuvaniṅ rarā, huvus anaṅgapi tukon iṅ aṅlalamar, samāpta payu, asaṅketa patəmune avavaraṅan, jajaka ikā aṅanti sa-ujar iṅ voṅ-atuvaniṅ rarā, təka riṅ pasamaya, den-palakeken iṅ voṅ len deniṅ bapaniṅ rarā, yen maṅkanā. saguṅniṅ tukon, mulihanikəl tur voṅ-atuvaniṅ rarā, kaḍəṇḍaha pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="19"> yen hana voṅ vadon elik iṅ lakine, vetniṅ tan parəpe, tukone mulihanikəl, amadal saṅgama arane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="20"> yen hana voṅ anunoni pari riṅ savah iṅ asavah saguṅ-lit iṅ pari mulihanikəl piṅlima mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve pari, tur kaḍəṇḍaha roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      1290
      .<p n="21">
      .riṅ aṣṭacorah varahakna. lakṣaṇa amamaliṅ, akon amamaliṅa, aveh paṅan iṅ maliṅ, aveh gənah iṅ maliṅ, samitra lavan maliṅ, atuduh saṅkaniṅ maliṅ oliha dalan, atuluṅ maliṅ, aniṅidakən maliṅ, iku aṣṭacorah arane. yogya ḍəṇḍanən denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen maṅkana; hana po bapaniṅ maliṅ, ibuniṅ maliṅ, anakiṅ maliṅ, kadaṅ iṅ maliṅ kabeh ikā, tan yogya ḍəṇḍanən denira saṅ amava bhūmi yen tan milu amaliṅ; riṅ voṅ lumakṣaṇa maliṅ, akon amaliṅa, aveh paṅan iṅ maliṅ, aveh gənah iṅ maliṅ, amitra maliṅ, anuduhakən saṅkaniṅ maliṅ vəruha, atuluṅ maliṅ, aniṅidakən maliṅ kavolu iku, yogya tibānana ḍəṇḍa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="22">
      1295riṅ voṅ lakṣaṇa maliṅ lavan akon amaliṅa, yen sacihna sayakti adoṣa pati iku karo denira saṅ amava bhūmi, anak-rabiniṅ maliṅ lavan sadr̥veniṅ maliṅ, kapañjiṅ ginənahakən riṅ pavonira saṅ amava bhūmi paknana dinol, vinevehakən denira saṅ amava bhūmi, kunəṅ anak-rabiniṅ akon amaliṅa kari ḍəṇḍanən salakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen paḍa akon amaliṅa lanaṅ lavan rabine paḍa doṣanana pati denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="23">
      .riṅ voṅ aveh gənah iṅ maliṅ, kalavan kaṅ aveh paṅan, yen sacihna sayakti, ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, den-anuṅgal-anuṅgal, anak-rabine tan ḍəṇḍanən ika; riṅ voṅ aniṅidakən matiṅ kalavan aṅrakṣa maliṅ, amuvus yen tan maliṅ andohakən maliṅ tur karuvan sacihna sayakti yen maliṅ ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi; kaṅ aṅubuṅ iṅ maliṅ, vəruh yen hana matiṅ tur mənəṅ, apan alavas pamitrane maliṅ ikā, ḍəṇḍanən salakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, doṣane vəruh yen maliṅ tur-api tan vəruh tur pamalərana, māriya amitra maliṅ.</p>
      .
      1300<p n="24">
      .kaṅ amaliṅ yen kacaṇḍaka patine anak-rabine dr̥vene, ləmahe petən denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen hana kavulane lanaṅ vadon tan petən denira saṅ amava bhūmi, luvarakəna sahutaṅe riṅ maliṅ ikā.</p>
      .
      .<p n="25">
      .panəbusan iṅ maliṅ, yen, amalaku iṅurip, voluṅ tali riṅ voṅ satuṅgalsatuṅgal maṅkana kaluvarane, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa mariṅ saṅ amava bhūmi, paṅliśava mariṅ kaṅ minaliṅan saguṅ iṅ dr̥ve iṅalap iṅ maliṅ mulihanikəl riṅ minaliṅan; maṅkana liṅniṅ āgama.</p>
      1305
      .<p n="26">
      .yen hana deśa hana kampihan, olih maliṅ təṇḍas iṅ maliṅ, lavan pomah-omahe, anak-rabine aturakəna riṅ saṅ amava bhūmi, maṅkana yuktiniṅ laku; kunəṅ kadaṅ-varganiṅ maliṅ yen tan milu amamaliṅ, tan yukti ikā ḍəṇḍanən.</p>
      .
      .<p n="27">
      1310voṅ aveh upakāra riṅ maliṅ, aveh mantraniṅ amaliṅ, ya guruniṅ maliṅ, vulaṅun araniṅ voṅ maṅkana ḍəṇḍanən nəm lakṣa de saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="28">
      .riṅ maliṅ, yen sacihna sayakti yen malayu, ruruhən patenana deniṅ voṅ rāmadeśa, yen rahinaha i patenana uga,
      .hana po mulat mənəṅ ikaṅ rāmadeśa tan harəp amatenana maliṅ, ḍəṇḍanən ikaṅ mulat mənəṅ pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      1315
      .<p n="29">
      .riṅ voṅ amet upahan amateni voṅ tan padoṣa mati kaṅ iṅupahakən deniṅ aṅalap upah, amalaku upahan, nora vinehan deniṅ aṅupahakən; dadi patukare aucapan, paḍa kasərəṅən kaṅ iṅupah lavan aṅupah, tan hana maṅga salah saviji mənəṅa, aṅaṅgas tan vinehan ati arane, liṅ iṅ saṅ hyaṅ āgama, vəkasan kasapekṣan dene aṅalap upah dene aṅupahakən, apan aucapan baribin karuhun yen amateni voṅ tan padoṣa iku paḍa corah arane, yen voṅ maṅkana karo adoṣa pati denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="30"> riṅ voṅ ambək duṣṭa siṅ sa-ulahe hala, sagavene agave pāpa-pātakane avake makādi maliṅ luṅha sakiṅ gənahe, malayu saparane, rurohən denira saṅ amava bhūmi, katəmu po ikaṅ voṅ maṅkana, patenana kayogyane denira saṅ amava bhomi sakehe kaṅ milu riṅ iya.</p>
      1320
      .<p n="31">
      .riṅ voṅ ginənahan deniṅ duṣṭa, ḍahat arusuh makādi maliṅ kayogyane patenana rumuhun kaṅ duṣṭa ḍahat arusuh ikā, makādi maliṅ, kayogyaniṅ laku kaṅ gənahiṅ arusuh ikā sahanane dr̥vene rampasən ikā denira saṅ harəp iṅ kr̥tta aṅrakṣa bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="32">
      1325yen hana voṅ adoṣa riṅ sira saṅ amava bhūmi, hana ta voṅ tan paveh patihane kaṅ adoṣa riṅ sira ikā, vet iṅ sihe riṅ iya, yen aguṅ pavehe sukha riṅ voṅ kaṅ adoṣa riṅ saṅ amava bhūmi ikā, mundur saṅ rumakṣa amet rahayuhaniṅ bhūminira den-avara, saṅkane vuruṅa mati voṅ kaṅ arusuh ikā, yen hana voṅ maṅkana, yogya ilokna kapatihaniṅ arusuh, duṣṭa makādi maliṅ, ambahak, ambaranaṅ, amlagandaṅ aṅalap laraṅan, amateni voṅ tan padoṣa, aṅupasi, anəluh ya iku sarvarusuh arane, yen sacihna sayakti, maṅkana liṅira saṅ paṇḍita saṅ pgat iṅ aji kuṭara mānava, saṅ vəruh riṅ hala-hayu, saṅ vəruh riṅ marganiṅ pāpa lavan marganiṅ anəmu svarga. yen hana voṅ aṅiloni arusuh, apihalaṅ aṅavara riṅ śabda kevala ḍəṇḍanikā roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, kaṅ apihalaṅ śabda iku voṅ amaṅikətakən sukhaniṅ vaṅke arane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="33">
      .riṅ voṅ aulah sāhasa ucapən maṅke. hana voṅ sāhasa, aklar dene kavānine, aṅadekən akeh vargane, aṅadekən dene sugih, saṅkane tan hana den-keriṅi, avuru dene kinavden iṅ sama-samane, aməraṅ pagər iṅ apagər, nora den-pet olihe aməraṅ pagər ikā; yen maṅkana ḍəṇḍa limaṅ tali; den-pet pagər ikā ḍəṇḍa salakṣa, bhaṅga tur anaṅtaṅ ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa ḍəṇḍane katur iṅ saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      1330<p n="34">
      .voṅ anutuh iṅ kayu siluṅ-luṅ sakiṅ tan vəruhe, nora den-pet ḍəṇḍa roṅ tali, yenora vəruh tur den-alap olihe anutuh ḍəṇḍa pataṅ tali; yen hana voṅ amaduṅ kayu siluṅ-luṅ akāraṇa sakiṅ valat, aamulene regane kayu siluṅ-luṅ den-ulihakəna anikəl piṅro, tur kaḍəṇḍaha roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi; yen hana voṅ amaduṅ kayu-kayuniṅ len, akāraṇa sāhasa ḍəṇḍa pataṅ tali.</p>
      .
      .<p n="35">
      .yen sāhasa amalat kbo-sapiniṅ len, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa, sāhasa amalat voṅ iṅ len, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa, ḍəṇḍa kahatur iṅ saṅ amava bhūmi, ulih-ulihan iṅ kbo-sapi, salvire kaṅ den-valat, makādi yen voṅ, mulihanikəl piṅro mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve.</p>
      1335
      .<p n="36">
      .yen hana voṅ sāhasa riṅ dr̥veniṅ voṅ, tur kāraṇa kasr̥ṅən dene amalat, dr̥ve kaṅ den-sāhasa mulihanikəl piṅro, samuleniṅ vinalat mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve, kaṅ amalat ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa katur iṅ saṅ amava bhūmi, doṣane kaṅ amalat lobha.</p>
      .
      .<p n="37">
      1340voṅ amalat dr̥veniṅ len sakalviraniṅ dr̥ve den-valatkarahiṅ voṅ, akārana ambək tan sareh, pinəṅiṅ laṅgana, akas tan ahiḍəp ujar iṅ apamalər, yen hana voṅ maṅkana yogya patenana denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen vəṅi kālane amet yen harəp ahuripa dəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa, kahatur iṅ saṅ amava bhūmi, deniṅ dr̥ve kaṅ den-valat mulihanikəl piṅro mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kaṅ den-sāhasa.</p>
      .
      .<p n="38">
      .yen hanā voṅ sāhasa aṅrusak āvaraṇa, babatan iṅ umah iṅ voṅ len ḍəṇḍa limaṅ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tur kaṅ den-rusak, muliha sampurṇa den-kaya duk iṅ kuna.</p>
      .
      1345<p n="39">
      .voṅ amraṅ āvaraṇa sakiṅ sr̥ṅəne, tur anaṅtaṅ, yen rahina kāla, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa, yen vəṅi kālane, doṣapati denira saṅ amava bhūmi paḍakəna lavan maliṅ ikā; maṅkana riṅ amraṅ lavaṅ iṅ len sakiṅ sr̥ṅəne, tur anaṅtaṅ, yen rahina ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa, yen vəṅi kāla patenana denira saṅ amava bhūmi maliṅ ikā; liṅniṅ āgama.</p>
      .
      .<p n="40">
      .hana ta voṅ amraṅ kayu-kayuniṅ len nora amit iṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kayu, daṇḍa pataṅ tali denira saṅ amava
      1350bhūmi; yen vəṅi kāla, pati doṣane denira saṅ amava bhūmi; kayu kaṅ den-praṅ mulihanikəl samūlene.</p>
      .
      .<p n="41">
      .riṅ ḍəṇḍaniṅ voṅ anāhasa-valat iṅ dr̥veniṅ adr̥ve ikā gavenira saṅ amava bhūmi, sasḍəṅ iṅ ḍəṇḍa anuta guṅ-lit iṅ doṣa, aguṅ doṣa aguṅ ḍəṇḍa; alit doṣa alit ḍəṇḍa; donira saṅ amava bhūmi aṅənakən ḍəṇḍa patəhaniṅ buddhiniṅ voṅ, hayo hana analasar iṅ ambək, hayo lumaku amuraṅ-muraṅ dalan; anuta sapatəh-patəh saṅ prabhu riṅ kr̥tta-rahayuhaniṅ bhūmi, apan iṅ ambək rahayu atmahan rahayu, amava mariṅ svarga phalane; maṅkana riṅ ulah hala atmah hala amava mariṅ pātaka pinakaphalane.</p>
      .
      1355<p n="42">
      .voṅ tan padoṣa, hayo aṅənəṅakən iṅ patuṅgal-tuṅgalan iṅ ḍəṇḍa aguṅ alit iki, kaṅ sakiṅ āgama viniji-viji: samas, ḍomas, roṅ tali, pataṅ tali, salakṣa, roṅ lakṣa, pataṅ lakṣa, saketi nəm lakṣa; den-prayatna ta denira saṅ amava bhūmi amaruṅgoken ḍəṇḍa guṅ lit iṅ ḍəṇḍa, hayo salah-paruṅgu, hayo andoñjani voṅ aulah-salah, maṅkana dharmanira saṅ amava bhūmi, yan harəp rahayuhaniṅ bhūminira.</p>
      .
      .<p n="43">
      .yen hana voṅ pakṣa ambəciki pomahan, kubon, taman, kakalen, savah, talāga, bəbəṅan, sivakan, sakalvir iṅ kaṅ den-bəciki tur dudu dr̥vene, dudu pakone kaṅ adr̥ve, yen hana voṅ maṅkana, tan vehana lābha kaṅ ambəciki ikā dene kaṅ adr̥ve; den-bhukti po olihe ambəciki ikā, palakunen ikā dene kaṅ adr̥ve hayo kaparihneṅ, tur kaḍəṇḍaha roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      1360
      .<p n="44">
      .voṅ amit aulah savah, vəkasan tan iṅulah hnəṅ ikaṅ savah, tagihən bhukti, amumuluhi adəg iṅ bhukti pari saguṅ iṅ olih iṅ savuh; ḍəṇḍa paḍa lavan loṅloṅ iṅ bhukti denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="45">
      1365riṅ voṅ añoloṅ sarvavija bubuṅkilan, sarvaphala, yen vəṅi kālane, doṣa pati de saṅ prabhu; yen rahina kālane, tikəlakəna piṅtlu.</p>
      .
      .<p n="46">
      .riṅ voṅ aṇḍampul rahina, ḍəṇḍa tikəlakəna piṅtlu saolihe aṇḍampul.</p>
      .
      1370<p n="47">
      .riṅ añoloṅ sajəṅ riṅ tuyuhan, riṅ kumbha, siṅ savaḍahane, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ tali, tur ikaṅ sajəṅ mulihanikəl piṅro.</p>
      .
      .<p n="48">
      .riṅ voṅ anavu sivakan riṅ vəṅi doṣa pati de saṅ amava bhūmi, hayo hinurip.</p>
      1375<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      .
      . -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      1380<p n="49">
      .voṅ añoloṅ ayam, sr̥gala, celeṅ, yen rahina, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ tali, kaṅ den-coloṅ mulihanikəl piṅro; yen vəṅi kālane añoloṅ, doṣa pati de saṅ prabhu.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      .@@A (le1): riṁ voṁ ṅañoloṁ hayam iṁ kuru(ṁ)ṅan·, riṁ caṁcaṅan·, ḍəṇda: roṁ lakṣa deniṁra saṅ amava bhumi,,
      1385@@B (le2): riṁ voṁṅ añoloṁ hayam iṁ kuruṅan·, riṁ ca:ṁ-caṅan·, ḍəṇḍa ⌈ [10-24]<margin hand="roman">51</margin>roṁṅ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhumī,,
      .@@C (le3): riṁ voṁṅ añoloṁṅ ayam iṁ kuruṅan·, riṁ caṁ-caṁṅan· ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa [09-18]<margin hand="roman">51</margin>de saṁṅ amava bhūmi ,, 0 ,,
      .@@L (lo1): riṁ voṁṅ hañoloṁ hayam iṁ kuruṅan·, [20r4]riṁ caṁ-caṅan·, ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa: de saṅ ha:mava: bhūmī. 0.
      .@@M (ma1): riṁ voṅ añoloṅ ayam iṁ kuruṅan·, riṁ caṁcaṅan·, ḍəṇḍa §[SH] roṁ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhumī,,
      .@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁ haño- [05r-23]loṁ hayam riṁ kuruṅan·, ḍaṇḍa roṁ lakṣa denira saṁ prabu ,, 0 ,,
      1390@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ añoloṅ ayam iṅ kuruṅan, riṅ caṅcaṅan, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi.
      .@@H (edH): riṅ voṅ añoloṅ ayam iṅ kuruṅan, riṅ caṅcaṅan, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi.
      . -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="50">
      1395riṅ voṅ añoloṅ ayam
      .<app rend="hide">
      . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">iṅ</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#ja1">riṅ</rdg>
      .</app>
      1400kuruṅan,
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">riṅ caṅcaṅan,</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#ja1"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg>
      .</app>
      1405ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#ja1 #edj #edh">denira</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le1">deniṁra</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1">de</rdg>
      1410</app>
      .saṅ
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">amava bhūmi.</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#ja1" cause="lexical">prabu</rdg>
      1415</app>
      .</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      .@@A (le1): yen hana voṁṅ añoloṁ mahapasu ṅaranya ke sampi, dəṇda: roṁ lakṣa de saṅ amava {*} bhu[11v2]mi, yen hana voṁṅ añoloṁ madyapasu harane vḍus·, bañak·, be(b)ek·, ḍəṇda: lakṣa, [SH] yen· (śu)drapasu harane, {la}celeṁ, camra, hayam·, sahiṅoni voṁ ṭani, dəṇda:niṁṅ abo[11v3]loṁ, lima tali,, ḍəṇda: kahatur riṁ saṅ amava bhumi,, hulih-ulihane kaṁ deṇ-celoṁ mulihani[SH]kəl piṁro,, yen de-coloṁ vṅi doṣa pati de saṁṅ amava bhumi,,
      1420@@B (le2): yen hana voṁṅ añoloṁ maha paśu sara-, ⌈ [10-25]ne, kbo sapi, ḍəṇḍa lakṣa de saṅ amava bhūmī,, yen añoloṁ maḍya- [10-26]ma paśu harane, vәdus·, bañak·, bebek·, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa,, yen sudra [10-27]paśu harane, celeṁ, camra, hayam·, sahiṅon-hiṅon voṁ tthani, ḍəṇḍani- <pb n="11"/><fw n="11" place="top-left"><num value="11">11</num></fw> [11-01]ṅ añoloṁ limaṁ tali, ḍəṇḍa kahatūr riṁ saṅ amava bhumi, hulih-ulihan sakehe [11-02]kaṁ den·coloṁ mulihanikəl piṁ ro,, yen den-coloṁ vṅi doṣa pati de śa- [11-03]<margin hand="roman">52</margin>ṅ amava bhumī,,
      .@@C (le3): yen ana voṁṅ añoloṁ maha paśu harane, kbo, [09-19]sapi, ḍaṇḍa roṁ lakṣa de saṁṅ amava bhūmi, yen añoloṁ madyama paśu, [09-20]harane, vḍus·, bañak·, bebek·, ḍəṇḍa: salakṣa. yen· śudr̥ pa- [09-21]śu harane, celeṁ, camr̥, hayam·, sahiṅon-iṅoṁ tani, ḍəṇḍaniṅ año- [09-22]loṁ, limaṁ tali, ḍəṇḍa kahatūr riṁ saṁṅ amava bhūmi, hulih-ulihan sa- IMG_0086 <pb n="10"/><fw n="10" place="top"><num value="10">10</num></fw> [10-01]kehe kaṁ den-coloṁ, mulihanikəl piṁ ro, yen den-coloṁ vṅi, [10-02]<margin hand="roman">52</margin>doṣa pati de saṁ prabhū ,, 0 ,,
      .@@L (lo1): yen ana: voṁ hañoloṁ maha: paśu harane, kbo sapī, ḍəṇḍa roṁ [20v1]lakṣa: de saṅ ha:mava: bhūmī. 0. yen añoloṁ madya paśu, harane vḍus·, bañak·, bebek·, ḍəṇḍa: salakṣa. 0. ye- [20v2]n añoloṁ sudra paśu, harane celeṁ, camra, hayam·, sahiṅon-iṅonaniṁ voṁ tanī, ḍəṇḍaniṁ hañoloṁ limaṁ talī, ḍəṇḍa: ka- [20v3]hatūr riṁ saṅ ha:mava: bhūmī, hulih-ulihan sakehe kaṁ den-coloṁ muliha:nikəl piṁ ro,, yen kaṁ den-coloṁ vṅī dośa patī de [20v4]saṅ ha:mava: bhūmī. 0.
      .@@M (ma1): yen hana voṅ año{X>}loṁ mahapasu ha[15r2]rane, /kbo, sapi,\ ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhūmī,, yen hañoloṁ ma:dyamahapasu hara§[SH]ne, vədus· bañak· bebek·,, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa,, yen· śudrapasu hara§[15r3]ne, celeṁ, camra, hayam·, /sa\-hiṅo/niṅo\ni voṁ tani, ḍəṇḍaniṁ hañoloṁ limaṁ tali [SH] , ḍəṇḍa kahatūr iṁ saṅ amava bhumī, hulihulihane sake hekaṁ den·-co§[15r4]loṁ mulihanikəl piṁro,, yen den·-coloṁ /X\ vṅi doṣa pati de saṁ prabu,,
      .@@X (ja1): yen ana voṁ haño maha paśu harane, kbo sapi, ḍaṇḍa roṁ lakṣa, de saṅ ama- [06v-02]va bumi, yen añoloṁ madya paśu, harane vḍus·, bañak·, ḍaṇḍa sa- [06v-03]lakṣa, yen añoloṁ sudra paśu harane, celeṁ, cambra, hayam· [06v-04]sahiṅon-iṅoniṁ voṁ tani, ḍaṇḍa kaṅ añoloṁ lamaṁ tali, ḍa- [06v-05]ṇḍane katur iṁ saṅ amava bumi, hulih-ulihane, sakehe kaṁ de- [06v-06]n-coloṁ, mulihanikəl piṁ ro, yen den-coloṁ vṅī doṣa pa- [06v-07]ti, de saṅ amava bumi ,, 0 ,,
      1425@@J (edJ): yen hana voṅ añoloṅ mahāpaśu arane kbo sapi, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhumi, yen añoloṅ madhyapaśu arane vḍus, bañak, bebek, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa, yen kṣudrapaśu arane celeṅ, camra, ayam sa-iṅon-iṅonaniṅ voṅ tani, ḍəṇḍaniṅ añoloṅ limaṅ tali, ḍəṇḍa kahatur iṅ saṅ amava bhumi, ulih-ulihane kaṅ den-coloṅ mulihanikəl piṅro; yen den-coloṅ vəṅi doṣa pati de saṅ amava bhumi.
      .@@H (edH): yen hana voṅ añoloṅ mahāpaśu arane kbo sapi, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhumi,
      .yen añoloṅ madhya pasu arane vḍus, bañak, bebek, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa,
      .yen añoloṅ sudra pasu, arane celeṅ, ayam sa-iṅon-iṅonaniṅ voṅ tani, ḍəṇḍaniṅ ñoloṅ limaṅ tali, ḍəṇḍa kahatur riṅ saṅ amava bhumi, ulih-ulihan sakehe kaṅ den-coloṅ muli-anikəl piṅ ro. yen kaṅ den-coloṅ vəṅi doṣa pati de saṅ amava bhumi.
      . -->

      . <!--
      1520@@A (le1): voṁṅ añoloṁ dr̥ve, ta[11v4]n (k)aton dene hambukti, təgəs/e\ haL̥pit savaḥ, sakalviraniṅ i nukti den·-L̥pit·, haṅlali-hali gagaduhan·, salviriṁ gagaduhan·, vkasan karuruḥ kasapekṣa deniṁ voṁṅ ake,, mali riṁ [12r1] voṁ moṅkono hara{,}ne, patenana denira saṅ amava bhumi,, maṅkana lini śa:sṭra,
      .@@B (le2): riṁ voṅ añoloṁ dr̥ve, tan katon dene hambukṭi, tgəse, haṅlə- [11-04]pit ṣavaḥ, sakalviraniṅ bukti den-ləpit·, haṅlali-lali gagaḍuhan salvirriṁ [11-05]gagaḍuhan·, vkasan karuruḥ kasapekṣan deniṁ voṁṅ akeḥ, ma<add place="below">liṁ</add> riṁ voṁ moṅko- [11-06]<margin hand="roman">53</margin>no, <subst><del rend="strikeout">la</del><add place="above">ha</add></subst>rane, patenana denira saṅ amava bhūmī,,
      .@@C (le3): voṁṅ añoloṁ dr̥ve, tan katon dene [10-03]hambukṭi, tgəse haṅL̥pit savaḥ, sakalvirriṁ bukṭi, den-ləpit·, haṅlali-lali [10-04]gagaḍuhan·, salvirraniṁ gagaḍuhan·, vkasan karuruḥ kasapekṣan deniṁ [10-05]voṁṅ akeḥ, maliṁ riṁ voṁ moṅko<del>ui ha</del>no harane, patenana denira [10-06]saṁṅ amava bhūmi, maṅkana hujar<del>re</del>riṁ śastra ,, 0 ,,
      .@@L (lo1): voṁ hañoloṁ dr̥ve, tan katon dene hambukṭi, təgəse, haṅləpit savaḥ, sakalviraniṁ bhūkṭī den-ləpit·, ha[21r1]ṅlali-lali gagaḍuhan· salviriṁ gagaḍuhan·, vkasan karuruḥ kasapekṣan deniṁ voṁ hakeḥ, maliṁ riṁ voṁ moṅkono, harane, patenana denira: [21r2]saṅ ha:mava: bhūmī, maṅkana: hujariṁ śastra. 0.
      .@@M (ma1): v§[SH]oṅ añoloṁ dr̥ve, tan katon dene hambuktī, təgəse, haL̥pi{na}t {s>}pa§[1{6}/5\v1]vaḥ, sakalviraniṁ bhukti den·-L̥pit·, haṅlalilalī gagaduhan sakalviraniṁ gaga[SH]duhan·, vkasan karuruḥ kasapekṣaṇ ḍeniṁ voṅ akeḥ, maliṁ riṁ voṁ maṅka[15v2]na harane, patenana denira saṅ amava bumī,, maṅkaṇa hujar iṁ sastra,,
      1525@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁ hañoloṁ dr̥ve tan katon· dene hambukṭi, təgəse, haL̥pit sa- [06v-09]vaḥ sakalviraniṁ bukṭi, den·L̥pit·, haṅlali-lali gagaḍuhan·, [06v-10]salviraniṁ gagaḍuhan·, vkasan karuruḥ kasapeksan deniṁ voṁṅ ake- [06v-11]ḥ, maliṁ riṁ voṁ moṅkono harane, patenana de saṅ amava bumi, [06v-12]maṅkaṇa hujja:r riṁ sastra: ,, 0 ,,
      .@@J (edJ): voṅ añoloṅ dr̥ve tan katon dene ambhukti, təgəse aṅləpit savah, sakalviraniṅ bhukti, den-ləpit, aṅlali-lali gagaḍuhan, salvir iṅ gagaḍuhan, vəkasan karuruh kasapekṣan deniṅ voṅ akeh, maliṅ riṅ voṅ moṅkono arane patenana denira saṅ amava bhumi; maṅkana liṅniṅ śāstra.
      .@@H (edH): voṅ añoloṅ dr̥ve, tan katon dene ambukti, təgəse aṅləpit savah, sakalviraniṅ bukti, den-ləpit, aṅlali-lali gagaḍuhan, salvir riṅ gagaḍuhan, vkasan karuruh kasapeksan deniṅ voṅ akeh, maliṅ riṅ voṅ maṅkana arane patenana denira saṅ amava bhumi. maṅkana ujar riṅ śāstra.
      . -->

      1530<p n="52">
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#le1 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">voṅ</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le2 #ja1">riṅ voṅ</rdg>
      .</app>
      1535añoloṅ dr̥ve, tan katon dene ambhukti, təgəse, aṅləpit savah,
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#le2 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh">sakalviraniṅ bhukti,</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le3">sakalvirriṁ bukṭi,</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#le1">sakalviraniṅ i nukti</rdg>
      1540</app>
      .den-ləpit, aṅlali-lali gagaḍuhan,
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #lo1 #edj #edh">salviriṅ gagaḍuhan,</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le3 #ja1">salvir<seg type="highlight">a</seg>niṅ gagaḍuhan,</rdg>
      1545 <rdg wit="#ma1">sa<seg type="highlight">ka</seg>lvir<seg type="highlight">a</seg>niṅ gagaḍuhan,</rdg>
      .</app>
      .vəkasan karuruh
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh">kasapekṣan deniṅ voṅ akeh</lem>
      1550 <rdg wit="#le1">kasapekṣa deniṁ voṁṅ ake</rdg>
      .</app>
      .,
      .<app>

      .</app>
      .riṅ voṅ

      1575<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      .@@A (le1): hana dr̥veni voṁ cinoloṁ deni maliṁ, deni cidraniṁ maliṁ, den-gənaḥhakən iṅ umaḥhi voṁ len· d[12r2]eniṁ maliṁ, ka:lani vṅi nora vruḥ kaṅ adr̥ve humaḥ, yen ṭini(ban-tiban)·, yen tan pava[SH]raḥha ri ramadeśa, riṁ tataṅga, tan pasaduva, tan apivruha riṅ akeḥ, sarupavarṇnane kaṁ cin[12r3]oloṁṅ i maliṁṅika, doṣa sadoṣani katiban vulu-vulu, ka:ṁ tiniban-tiban· kabə[SH]cikane haprasaduva, haveḥha pivruḥhiṅ akeḥ, yen tan haveḥ pivruḥ, ḍaṇda: ro lakṣa, kahatur [12r4] riṁ saṅ amava bumi, tan vəna yen yatenana, pan tan maliṅ arane,, 0 ,,
      .@@B (le2): maṅka:na hujariṁ śastra:,, ha- [11-07]na dr̥veniṁ voṁ cinoloṁ deniṁ maliṁ, cidraniṁ maliṁ, den-gəna<del>ḥ</del>hakən iṅ umahe voṁṅ len· [11-08]deniṁ maliṁ, kalaniṁ vṅi, nora vəruḥ kaṅ adr̥ve humaḥ yen tiniban-tiban·, ye- [11-09]n tanpa varaha riṁ ramadeṣa, riṁ tataṅga, tan pasaḍuha, tan pamivruha riṁ voṁṅ a- [11-10]keḥ sarūpa vvarṇnane kaṁ cinoloṁṅ iṁ maliṁṅ ika:, doṣa sadoṣaniṁ katiba- [11-11]n <subst><del rend="corrected">hu</del><add place="overstrike">vu</add></subst>lu-vulu, kaṁ tiniban-tiban·, kabcikane haprasaḍuha, haveh avəruḥ riṁṅ a- ⌈ [11-12]keḥ, yen tan a:veḥ pivruḥ, ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa, kahatūr riṁ saṅ amava bhūmī, tan vənaṁ yan pa- [11-13]<margin hand="roman">54</margin>tenana, Apan tan maliṁṅ arane ,, 0 ,,
      .@@C (le3): hana dr̥veniṁ voṁ cino- [08-17]loṁ deniṁ maliṁ, cidraniṁ maliṁ, den·gnahakən iṅ umahiṁ voṁ len deniṁ maliṁ, [08-18]kalaniṁ vṅi, nora vəruḥ kaṁṅ aduve humaḥ yen ti<add place="above">ni</add>ban-tiban·, ye<add place="above">n ta</add>npa varaha riṁ ra- [08-19]madeśa, riṁ tataṅga:, tan pasaduha:, tan amivruha riṁ voṁṅ akeḥ, sarupa: var- [08-20]ṇnane kaṁ cinoloṅ iṁ maliṁṅ ika:, doṣa sadoṣaniṁ katiban vulu-vulu kaṁ [08-21]tiniban-tiban·, habcikane haprasaduha, haveḥha:vruḥ hiṅ akeḥ, yen ta- [08-22]n aveḥ pivruḥ, ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa, kahatūr riṁ <add place="above">sa</add>ṅ amava bhūmi, tan v<subst><del rend="corrected">i</del><add place="overstrike">ә</add></subst>naṁ yan patenana, [08-23]<margin hand="roman">*</margin>Apan tan maliṁ ṅarane,,
      1580@@L (lo1): hana dr̥veniṁ voṁ cinoloṁ deniṁ maliṁ, cidraniṁ maliṁ, den-gənahakən iṁ humahiṁ voṁ len deniṁ ma- [21r3]liṁ, kalaniṁ vṅī, nora vəruḥ kaṅ ha:dr̥ve humaḥ yen tiniban-tiban·, yen tanpa varaha: riṁ rama:deśa:, riṁ tataṅga, tan pasaduha:, tan amivru- [21r4]hakna riṁ voṁ hakeḥ sarupa varṇna:ne kaṁ cinoloṅ iṁ maliṅ ika:, dośa: sadośaniṁ katiban vulu-vulu,, kaṁ tiniban-tiban·, ka-[21v1]bcikane haprasaduha:, haveha:vəruhiṁ hakeḥ, yen tan aveḥ pivruḥ, ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa, kahatūr iṁ saṅ ha:mava: bhūmī, tan vənaṁ yan pa- [21v2]tenana, hapan tan maliṁ harane,. 0.
      .@@M (ma1): hana dr̥ve[SH]niṁ voṁ cinoloṁ deniṁ maliṁ, cidraniṁ maliṁ, den-gənahakən iṅ uma[15v3]h iṁ voṁ len deniṁ maliṁ, kalaniṁ vṅi, nora vəruḥ kaṅ adr̥ve humaḥ, {t}/y\en tiniba§[SH]ntiban·, yen tan pavaraha riṁ ramadeṣa, riṁ {ta}tataṅga, tan pasaduha, tan a[15v4] mivruha /X(L̥)\ riṁ voṅ akeḥ sarupavarṇnane kaṁ cinoloṁ riṁ maliṅ ika, doṣa sado[SH]ṣaniṁ katiban vulu/vulu\, kaṁ tinibantiban·, kabcikane haprasaduha, have[16r1]ha vəruh i{e>ṅa}ṅ akeḥ, yen tan aveḥh iṁ vruḥ, /X hakeḥ,\ ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa, kahatūr iṁ saṅ amava [SH] bhūmī, tan vənaṁ patena:na, hapan tan maliṁ harane,,
      .@@X (ja1): hana dr̥veniṁ voṁ cinoloṁ deniṁ maliṁ, den-gəna:hakən riṁ huma- [06v-14]hiṁ voṁ len·, deniṁ maliṁ kalaniṁ vṅi, nora vəruḥ kaṅ a:dr̥ve humaḥ [06v-15], yen tiniban-tiban·, yen tanpa vara:ha riṁ voṁ ramadeṣa, riṁ tataṅga, [06v-16], tan pasaḍuha:kna riṁ voṁṅ akeḥ, sarupane varṇna:ne kaṁ ci- ⌈ [06v-17]noloṁ maliṁ hika, doṣa sadoṣaniṁ maliṁ anibani hulu-hulu, kaṁ [06v-18]tiniban-tiban hika, kabcikane haprasaḍuha haveḥ vəruhiṁṅ aka- [06v-19]taḥ, yan tan aveḥ vәruḥ, ḍaṇḍa roṁ lakṣa kahatur riṁ saṅ a:mava [06v-20]bumi, tan vənaṁ yen patenana, hapan tan aliṅ harane ,, 0 ,,
      .@@J (edJ): hana dr̥veniṅ voṅ cinoloṅ deniṅ maliṅ, deniṅ cidraniṅ maliṅ, den-gənahakən iṅ umah iṅ voṅ len deniṅ maliṅ kālaniṅ vəṅi, nora vəruh kaṅ adr̥ve umah, yen tinibān-tibān, yen tan pavaraha riṅ rāmadeśa, riṅ tataṅga; tan pasaduva, tan apivəruha riṅ voṅ akeh sarūpa-varṇane kaṅ cinoloṅ iṅ maliṅ ikā, doṣa sadoṣaniṅ katibān vulu-vulu, kaṅ tinibān-tibān kabəcikane aprasaduva, aveha pivruh iṅ akeh, yen tan aveh pivruh ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa kahatur iṅ saṅ amava bhumi, tan vənaṅ yen patenana, pan tan maliṅ arane.
      .@@H (edH): ana dr̥ve niṅ voṅ cinoloṅ deniṅ maliṅ, deniṅ cidra niṅ maliṅ, den-gənahakən iṅ umah iṅ voṅ len deniṅ maliṅ, kālaniṅ vəṅi, nora vəruh kaṅ adr̥ve umah, yen tinibān-tibān, yen tanpa varaha riṅ rāmadeśa, riṅ tataṅga. tanpa saduha, tan amivruhakna riṅ voṅ akeh sarūpa varṇa kaṅ cinoloṅ iṅ maliṅ ikā, doṣa sadoṣa niṅ katibān vulu-vulu, kaṅ tinibān-tibān kabəcikane aprasaduha, aveha averuh akәn, yen tan aveh pivruh, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa kahatur iṅ saṅ amava bhumi, tan vənaṅ yen patenana, pan tan maliṅ arane.
      1585 -->

      1710 <!--
      .@@A (le1): hana voṁ hatitip·, yen hasa{b}\ṇ/daha hana maniḥ voṁ len· titip· yen asa{b}ṇdaha kuneṁ, pada ta rupane titi[12v1]pan ika tuṅgal· varṇnane, korup iṁ pasa{bda}\ṇda:/n·, riṁ titipan·, tan dəndanən ika de saṅ a/mava\ bhumi, yen tan apakṣakən aṅalap·, tumuliha d{e}r̥vene mula hika kaṁ korup·,
      .@@B (le2): hana voṁṅ atitip·, yen asasa- [11-14]ṇḍaha:, hana maniḥ voṁ yen a:titip·, yen asasaṇḍaha kunəṁ, paḍa ta rupa- ⌈ [11-15]ne titipa:n ika:, tuṅgal varṇnane, korup iṁ pasaṇḍan·, riṁ patitipan·, taṇ ḍəṇḍa- [11-16]nən ika denira saṅ amava bhūmī, yen tan amakṣaknaṅalap·, tūr muliha dr̥ve- ⌈ [11-17]<margin hand="roman">55</margin>ne mula hika kaṁ korup·,,
      .@@C (le3): hana voṁṅ ati- [30-06]tip·, yen asaṇḍaha:, <del>hana maniḥ voṁṅ atitip·</del>, yen asa- [30-07]ṇḍaha, paḍa ta rūpane titipan ika:, tuṅgal varṇane, ko- [30-08]rup iṁ pasaṇḍan·, riṁ patitipan·, taṇ ḍəṇḍanən ika:, de saṁ- [30-09]ṅ amava bhūmi, yen tan amakṣakәnaṅalap·, tūr muliha [30-10]<margin hand="roman">55</margin>dr̥vene mula kaṁ korup·,,
      .@@L (lo1): hana voṁ hatitip·, yen aśaśaṇḍaha:, hana maniḥ voṁ len a:titip·, yen aśaśaṇḍaha: kunəṁ, pa- [21v3]ḍa ta: rupane titipan ika:, tuṅgal· varṇna:ne, korup iṁ pasaṇḍan·, riṁ patitipa:n·, tan dəṇḍanən ika: denira: saṅ ha:mava: bhūmī, yen ta:- [21v4]n amakṣakna:ṅalap·, tūr muliha: dr̥vene mula: hika: kaṁ korup·,,
      1715@@M (ma1): hana voṅ atitip·, y[16r2]en hasasaṇḍaha, hana maniḥ voṁ len a:titip·, yen asasaṇḍaha kunəṁ, pada ta § [SH] rupane titipan ika, tuṅgal· rupane, korup iṁ pasandan·, riṁ patitipa[16r3]n·, taṇ ḍəṇḍanən denira saṅ amava bhumī, yen tan amakṣaknaṅalap·, tūr muliha dr̥§[SH]vene, mula hika kaṁ de korup·,,
      .@@X (ja1): hana voṁ hatitip·, yen hasasandaha kunaṁ, paḍa ta rupane titi- [06v-22]pan ika, tuṅgal varṇane korup iṁ sasandan·, riṁ patitipan hika [06v-23], tan dəṇḍanən ika, denira saṅ a:mava bumi, yen tan pakara:kna: [06v-24] [06r-01]ṅalap·, tumuli dr̥vene mula: kaṁ korup·,
      .@@J (edJ): hana voṅ atitip, yen asasaṇḍaha kunəṅ, paḍa ta rupane titipan ikā, tuṅgal varṇane, korup iṅ pasaṇḍan, riṅ patitipan, tan ḍəṇḍanən ikā de saṅ amava bhumi, yen tan amakṣakən aṅalap tur muliha dr̥vene mula ika kaṅ korup.
      .@@H (edH): ana voṅ atitip, yen asasaṇḍaha, ana manih voṅ len atitip, yen asasaṇḍaha kunəṅ, paḍa ta rupane titipan ikā, tuṅgal varṇane, korup iṅ pasaṇḍan, riṅ patitipan, tan ḍəṇḍanən ikā denira saṅ amava bhumi, yen tan amakṣakən aṅalap, tur muliha dr̥vene mula ika kaṅ korup.
      . -->

      .<p n="54">
      .hana voṅ atitip,
      .<app>
      .<lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edh">
      1725 <app>
      . <lem wit="#le2">yen asasaṇḍaha,</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le1 #le3">yen asaṇḍaha,</rdg>
      .</app>
      . <app>
      1730 <lem wit="#lo1 #ma1 #edh">hana manih voṅ len atitip,</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le1">hana maniḥ voṁ len titip</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#le2">hana maniḥ voṁ yen atitip,</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#le3">hana maniḥ voṁṅ atitip</rdg>
      . </app>
      1735 <app>
      . <lem wit="#lo1 #le2 #ma1 #edh">yen asasaṇḍaha kunəṅ,</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le1">yen asaṇḍaha kunəṅ,</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#le3">yen asaṇḍaha</rdg>
      . </app>
      1740</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#ja1 #edj" cause="eye-skip">yen asasaṇḍaha kunəṅ,</rdg>
      .</app>
      .paḍa ta rupane titipan ikā, tuṅgal
      .<app>

      ., korup iṅ
      .<app>

      ., riṅ

      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      1785 <!--
      .@@A (le1): voṁṅ aṅalap· dr̥ve, tuṅga[12v2]l· sagənaḥ yan lavan dr̥veni voṁ len·, tan abna dene haṅulihakən·, kaṁ gnaḥhe hika, huvu{sa}[SH]s vəruḥ yen ḍudu dr̥vene, den-taṅgapi huga, Apan· L̥viḥ rupa: L̥viḥ varṇna, dr̥nveveni len ika:, de[12v3]ne haR̥pe, tumon i bəcik·, tka den-alap·, riṁ voṁ maṅkana ḍəṇda:nen· roṁ * lakṣa de saṅ ama[SH]va bumi, turr ilaṅ adr̥vene muliḥhanikəl piṁro,, 0 ,,
      .@@B (le2): voṁṅ aṅalap· dr̥ve, tuṅgal sagnaḥ lavan dr̥veniṁ voṁ [11-18]len·, tan abnər dene haṅulihakən kaṁ gnahe hika:, vuvus və<del>na</del>ruḥ yen dudu [11-19]dr̥vene, den-taṅgapi hu<del>ta</del>ga, Apan· L̥viḥ rūpa L̥viḥ varṇna dr̥veniṁ len i- [11-20]ka:, dene haR̥pe, tumon iṅ abc<subst><del rend="corrected">ә</del><add place="overstrike">i</add></subst>k·, tka den-<subst><del rend="corrected">ū</del><add place="overstrike">a</add></subst>lap·, riṁ voṁ maṅkana ḍəṇḍa- [11-21]nən·, roṁ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhūmī, tūrr ikaṁ dr̥ve mulihanikəl piṁ ro ,, 0 ,,
      .@@C (le3): voṁṅ aṅalap· dr̥ve, tuṅga- [30-11]l·, sagnaḥ lavan dr̥veniṁ voṁ len·, tan abnər dene haṅu- [30-12]lihakən·, kaṁ gnahe hika:, huvus· vəruḥ yan ḍudu dr̥ve- ⌈ [30-13]ne, den-taṅgapi huga:, hapan· L̥viḥ rūpane, L̥viḥ varṇna [30-14]dr̥veniṁ len ika:, dene haR̥pe tumon i bcik·, tka [30-15]den-alap·, voṁ maṅkana:, ḍəṇḍanən· roṁ lakṣa de [30-16]saṁṅ amava bhūmi, tūr rikaṁ dr̥ve mulihanikəl· piṁ ro,,
      .@@L (lo1): voṁ haṅalap· dr̥ve, tuṅgal sagnaḥ lavan dr̥veniṁ voṁ len·, ta-[22r1]n abnər dene haṅulihakən·, kaṁ gnahe hika:, vuvus vəruḥ yeṇ ḍudu dr̥vene, den-taṅgapi huga:, Apan· L̥viḥ rupa: L̥viḥ varṇna: dr̥ve- [22r2]niṁ len ika:, dene haR̥pe, tumon iṁṅ habcik·, tka: den-alap·, riṁ voṁ maṅkana:, ḍəṇḍanən·, roṁ lakṣa: de saṅ ha:mava: bhūmī, tūr hikaṁ [22r3]dr̥ve muliha:nikəl piṁ ro. 0 |
      1790@@M (ma1): voṅ aṅalap· dr̥ve, tūṅgal· sa[16r4]gnaḥ lavan dr̥veniṁ voṁ len·, tan abənər dene haṅulihakən·, kaṁ gn{ə}ahe hika:, § [SH] vuvus vəruḥ yen ḍudu dr̥/ve\ne, {da} den-taṅgapi huga, hapan· L̥viḥ rūpa L̥vi[1{7}/6\v1]ḥ varṇna dr̥veniṁ len ika:, dene haR̥pe, tumon i habcik· tka de{la}n-a§[SH]lap·, riṁ voṁ maṅkaṇa ḍəṇḍanən· roṁ lakṣa de saṅ a{dr̥}/ma\v{e}a bhumī, {dr̥}{-e}§[16v2]/(t)ūr i/(k)aṁ\ dr̥\v/e\ hika mulihanikəl piṁro,, 0 ,,
      .@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁ haṅa:lap· [06r-02]dr̥ve, tuṅgal sagnaḥhe lavan· dr̥veniṁ voṁ len·, tan a- [06r-03]ntәṁ dene haṅulihakən·, kaṁ gnahe hiku, vuvus vəruḥ ye- [06r-04]ṇ ḍudu dr̥vene, tka den-taṅga;pin uga, hapan lәviḥ L̥vi- [06r-05]ḥ rupane dr̥veniṁ len hika, deniṁ haR̥p tumon iṁ ha- [06r-06]bcik·, dr̥veniṁ len hika, tka den-alap·, ḍaṇḍanən roṁ [06r-07]lakṣa denira saṅ a:mava: bumi, tur rikaṁ dr̥ mulihanikə- [06r-08]l piṁ ro ,, 0 ,,
      .@@J (edJ): voṅ aṅalap dr̥ve tuṅgal sagənah lāvan dr̥veniṅ voṅ len, tan abənər dene aṅulihakən kaṅ gənahe ikā, huvus vəruh, yen dudu dr̥vene, den-taṅgapi uga, apan ləvih rupa ləvih varṇa dr̥veniṅ len ikā, dene karəpe tumon iṅ bəcik təka den-alap, riṅ voṅ maṅkana ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhumi, tur ikaṅ dr̥ve mulihanikəl piṅro.
      .@@H (edH): voṅ ṅalap dr̥ve tuṅgal sagənah lāvan dr̥veniṅ voṅ len, tan abənər dene aṅulihakən kaṅ gənahe ika, vuvus vəruh, yen dudu dr̥vene, den-taṅgapi uga, apan ləvih rupa ləvih varṇa dr̥veniṅ len ikā, dene arəpe tumon iṅ ta bəcik təka den-alap, riṅ voṅ maṅkana ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa de saṅ amava bhumi, tur ikaṅ dr̥ve muli-anikəl piṅro.
      . -->
      1795<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="55">
      .<app>

      .dr̥ve, tuṅgal

      .dene aṅulihakən, kaṅ gənahe

      .uga, apan ləvih

      .,
      1865<app>
      . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">riṅ voṅ maṅkana</lem>

      1870 ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa

      . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">de</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#ja1">denira</rdg>
      .</app>
      1875saṅ amava bhūmi, tur ikaṅ
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#le2 #le3 #lo1 #edj #edh">ikaṅ dr̥ve</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le1">ilaṅ adr̥vene</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#ma1">ikaṅ dr̥ve ika</rdg>
      1880 <rdg wit="#ja1">ikaṅ dr̥</rdg>
      .</app>
      .mulih anikəl piṅro.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--
      1885
      . -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="56">
      .kavulanira saṅ ratu, mantriya, yen ulahniṅ duṣṭa. den-lakokən makādi ulahe ātatāyi muvah aṅulahakən corah, aṅiloni maliṅ gavene, yen hana kavulaniṅ ratu maṅkana, yen hana kavulaniṅ mantri maṅkana, yen pinaten deniṅ voṅ, tan vənaṅ yen vicaranən kapatine, apan doṣaniṅ duṣṭa, doṣaniṅ ātatāyi, doṣaniṅ maliṅ, katlu iku, doṣa pati, āgamane denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      1890
      .<p n="57">
      .yen hana voṅ apasilih sañjata riṅ voṅ duṣṭa siṅ amateni voṅ olihe, savarṇaniṅ lalaṇḍəp tumuli gənahe amateni voṅ, mati kaṅ den-pateni ikā, yen atatuva kasakitan deniṅ duṣṭa, kaṅ apasəlaṅ sañjata riṅ duṣṭa ikā ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="58">
      1895riṅ voṅ arorovaṅ duṣṭa, vəruh yen duṣṭa tur den-voṅi, kavr̥tta riṅ deśa paradeśa, kaṅ arorovaṅ duṣṭa, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi; yen tan vəruh yen duṣṭa, tan ḍəṇḍanən ikā de saṅ prabhu.</p>
      .
      .<p n="59">
      .riṅ voṅ anuduk, anumbak, anulup, sakalviriṅ sañjata, aṅənani avak iṅ para, yen iṅ gigira taṅan, suku ḍəṇḍa salakṣa, yen madhya tatune yen anuduk gulu śirah ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa yen uttama tatune, iku ḍəṇḍa mariṅ saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      1900<p n="60">
      .riṅ voṅ anuduk amukul iṅ kayu, aṅgitik iṅ vatu, ḍəṇḍa limaṅ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmi iku yen tan patiha, lara-tatune, yen amrəp, aṅgocoh riṅ taṅan, ḍəṇḍa satak, yen paḍa rorovaṅe sabran dina aməṅ-aməṅ.</p>
      .
      .<p n="61">
      .riṅ voṅ vadon amukul anuduk iṅ kayu riṅ marune aṅgitik iṅ vatu, ambaṇḍəm, tan pakārana yen kaṅ deṅitik den-baṇḍəm uttama tatune tikəl muñcar, kaṅ aṅgitik, yen ambaṇḍəma, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi; yen mati kaṅ den-gitik, patenana kaṅ aṅgitik denira saṅ amava bhūmi. voṅ vadon anuduk iṅ marune riṅ kris, pḍaṅ, tumbak, salviraniṅ lalaṇḍəp
      1905den-sudukakən, uttama tatune kaṅ den-suduk, doṣa pati kaṅ anuduk denira saṅ amava bhūmi; maṅkana ujar iṅ śāsana bhagavān bhr̥gu.</p>
      .
      .<p n="62">
      .riṅ voṅ sāhasa amraṅ anuduk, yen kataton kaṅ den-suduk den-praṅ, aveha patiba-jampi, riṅ kaṅ sinuduk ikā sasḍəṅe pavehe ahiṅana savarase tatune, tur kaḍəṇḍaha roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, kabeh sahanane, kaṅ aṅrovaṅ iṅ aṅadoken iṅ anuduk, ḍəṇḍa kahatur iṅ saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      1910<p n="63">
      .rare duruṅ vəruh riṅ halahayu, yen kuraṅ śakiṅ sapuluh tahun vayahe, yen hana ulahe dudu, tan yogya ḍəṇḍanən denira saṅ amava deśabhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="64">
      .voṅ kapraṅ, tan minaha dene pinraṅ, sakiṅ tan vəruhe kaṅ aməraṅ halahipene kaṅ kapəraṅ, yen ora atatu, yen ora alara, tan kaḍəṇḍaha kaṅ aməraṅ, atatu po kaṅ kapəraṅ, kaṅ aməraṅ aveha patuku tamba saukure varasiṅ tatu, tur kaṅ aməraṅ kaḍəṇḍaha limaṅ atus denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      1915
      .<p n="65">
      .riṅ voṅ abuburu riṅ laraṅan, yen olih, ḍəṇḍa voluṅ tali riṅ voṅ satuṅgal-satuṅgal vivijinən denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tur ikaṅ huron tikəlakəna mulih roro riṅ satuṅgal-satuṅgal; yen tan polih ḍəṇḍa pataṅ tali riṅ voṅ satuṅgal-satuṅgal; maṅkana śāsananiṅ abuburu riṅ laraṅan, ujar bhagavān bhr̥gu.</p>
      .
      .<p n="66">
      1920vaṅke ginənah deniṅ duṣṭa amateni voṅ riṅ deśaniṅ adeśa kālaniṅ vəṅi, nora vəruh kaṅ adr̥ve ləmah ḍəṇḍanikaṅ adr̥ve ləmah, yen mulat mənəṅ dene kasalahan vaṅke yen kavəṅen ikaṅ vaṅke ḍəṇḍane roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, sapakaramane milu kaḍəṇḍa, arane katəmu vaṅke kabunan; kunəṅ yen tuhu tan vəruh riṅ kaṅ amateni tur asadu riṅ deśa pakaraman, riṅ tataṅga deśa tpi siriṅ, makādi asadu riṅ pamañcan, tan ahlət vəṅi, tan doṣanana denira saṅ amava bhūmi; yen ahləta vəṅi pasadune, doṣa, maṅkana dharma; yadyastun aprasaduva, yen hana vruh jəjəpe, yen paṅavak deśa amateni voṅ mati ikā, doṣa ikaṅ deśa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="67">
      .riṅ śava yen kanin deniṅ sañjata tampake, haneṅ alas, riṅ savah, riṅ kubon, riṅ tgal, riṅ margga snət, riṅ margaguṅ, riṅ bəbəṅan, riṅ piṅgir iṅ loh, makādi riṅ bañjar, yen kasapekṣana kaṅ amateni, yen tan kasapeksana, haṅiṅ aprasaduva uga voṅ deśa; vruh riṅ kaṅ amateni, nora aṅarani akārana aṅubuṅi duṣṭa ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa; mulat mənəṅ, tumon iṅ vaṅke tan aprasaduva riṅ kaṅ yogya sadonana, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa, doṣaniṅ mulat mənəṅ trapakəna denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      1925<p n="68">
      .riṅ voṅ paḍa səṅite, paḍa galake, paḍa vānine, paḍa laṇḍəpe krise tumbake, atukaran, paḍa panuduke yen matiya salahtuṅgal, kaṅ kari ahurip tan ḍəṇḍanən ikaṅ kari denira saṅ amava bhūmi, krodhavirodha arane, liṅniṅ āgama; yen hana voṅ anapih voṅ atukar paḍa vānine kasuduk deniṅ kris iṅ atukar, yen katumbaka, siṅ sañjata oliha riṅ ananapih tan ucapən ikā denira saṅ amava bhūmi, apan amukti duhkaniṅ ananapih arane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="69">
      .riṅ voṅ atukar tan aṅavaśakən patukare, kasoran dene lavane riṅ vəkasan, malayu aṅuṅsi umah, den tut dene lavane atukar, mati kaṅ malayu ikā, yen kaṅ anut amburu matiha, salahtuṅgala mati tan vicaranən kaṅ amateni.</p>
      1930
      .<p n="70">
      .riṅ voṅ atukar arukət, paḍa vānine, malayu salah tuṅgal anut təka riṅ umahe mati salahtuṅgal, tan səṅgunən aṅamuk ikaṅ amateni, atukar uga arane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="71">
      1935riṅ atukar kalaniṅ vəṅi, amateni pinaten sḍəṅe atukar iṅ vəṅi ikā, amateni śatru arane, kaliṅaniṅ atukar vəṅi, yen huvusapih, tan yogya amalenana patukare manih təka riṅ rahina, apan yen ambakalana atukar manih rahina tan pakāraṇa manih, tur amateni, paḍakəna ian aṅamuk, yogya patihane kaṅ anutugakən tukar ikā denira saṅ amava bhūmi, kaliṅane riṅ atukar yen huvusapih, kambəṅan deniṅ rahina, kambəṅan deniṅ vəṅi, tan kavaśa yen ambakalana patukare manih; maṅkana śabdaniṅ āgama.</p>
      .
      .<p n="72">
      .tiṅkahe apihutaṅ ucapən iṅsun maṅke śāsaṇane: hayo təka apihutaṅ, adusakaramasa rumuhun, ararahupa, aradina śarira riṅ reh iṅ apihutaṅ, vus iṅ abəbərəsih amətonana riṅ amalaku ahutaṅa, paṅgavakəna mas, pisis salaka, sakarəpe kaṅ ahutaṅ vehakna; kālaniṅ apihutaṅ hayo salah dina riṅ soma, riṅ vr̥haspati, tur den prayatna deniṅ apihutaṅ tulisakəna aran iṅ ahutaṅ tkaniṅ deśane bañjare, tulisən riṅ harəp iṅ ahutaṅ <supplied reason="unknown">lavan, guṅe hutaṅe</supplied>, tulisakəna tahune māsatithine taṅgal paṅloṅe, saptavārane, pañcavārane, ṣaḍvārane, lavan vukune, makādi guṅe hutaṅe, tkaniṅ putrane den saha sākṣi, pinakādi cirine kaṅ ahutaṅ, lekhya arane riṅ ciri; iku surat pavitan arane.</p>
      .
      1940<p n="73">
      .riṅ ahutaṅ aveh putra kalāntara naṅkən tahun riṅ apihutaṅ, vəkasanora aveh kalāntara putra, kaṅ ahutaṅ ikā tagihən anikəl piṅro uga panahurane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="74">
      .riṅ apihutaṅ norana surat pihutaṅ, tan hana sākṣi, tan hana bhukti kalāntara sabran vulan, sabran tahun,
      1945hilaṅ ikaṅ pihutaṅ, yen maṅkana. riṅ apihutaṅ aṅgəgəmana yaktiniṅ apihutaṅ tətəlu. paran ta yaktine? sakiṅ sākṣi yaktiniṅ apihutaṅ, sakiṅ tulis yaktiniṅ apihutaṅ, sakiṅ bhukti putra kalāntara yaktiniṅ apihutaṅ; sākṣi alah deniṅ pasusuratan, pasusuratan alah deniṅ bhukti, patṅərane yen ahutaṅ, yakti tətəlu iku uga gəgəmana deniṅ apihutaṅ, yen tan hana yakti tətəlu iku, liñok aran iṅ apihutaṅ maṅkana, apan yakti tətəlu iku vənaṅ panagihakəna deniṅ apihutaṅ tumus iṅ anak putu, pihutaṅ tuhu yen hana pramāṇa traya ararne iku.</p>
      .
      .<p n="75">
      .riṅ voṅ apihutaṅ aṅləvihi panagihe putra paṅalāntara, kaduk pamete putra, duruṅ tkaniṅ pasaṅketa tumuli anagih, lobha araniṅ apihutaṅ maṅkan. riṅ voṅ apihutaṅ tan panut saujar iṅ āgama, tan sareh panagihe, tan sareh dene amumutrakən, atmahan kavlas-asih, yen tan panut dharmaniṅ apihutaṅ tan vuruṅ anəmu upadravaniṅ hyaṅ kaliṅane sagavehane
      .den-anut dalan guṅ aguṅ.</p>
      1950
      .<p n="76">
      .tiṅkahiṅ voṅ aṅalap dr̥veniṅ voṅ, sakiṅ tan yukti pamete, iṅətakəna ri sajəroniṅ nəm vulan hilaṅ ikaṅ dr̥ve pinetiṅ tan yukti, manih yen tan hilaṅ iṅ nəm vulan, iṅətakəna vkase riṅ nəm tahun, hilaṅ tkaniṅ pavitane kaṅ aṅalap iṅ tan yukti, kaliṅane haja amet pisis akārṇa sakiṅ tan yukti, ila-ila tmən sakiṅ ujar iṅ śāstra.</p>
      .
      .<p n="77">
      1955yen hana voṅ apəpəgatan alaki arabi, yen salah-tuṅgal mati kaṅ apəpəgatan ikā, anake amanahurana hutaṅe kaṅ apəpəgatan ikā; kaṅ apihutaṅ haja mənəṅ pgatane hutaṅe kaṅ mati ikā, iku dharmane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="78">
      .yen hana voṅ pgat anak-anak, vet iṅ bapa-ibune tan parep anak-anak iṅ iya, tan panut iṅ ambək ahayu anake ikā, aveha yakti riṅ rāma-deśa, riṅ bañjara, aveha vijā manih aveha bañu dus lavan isuh-isuh, tpuṅ tavar, saha sākṣi, den sacihna sayakti pgat mariṅ anak-anak iṅ iya, ikaṅ anak ikā, yan huvus maṅkana, tan paṅalap dr̥veniṅ bapa-ibu, tan tagihen hutaṅe
      .bapa-ibu deniṅ apihutaṅ.</p>
      1960
      .<p n="79">
      .riṅ hutaṅ tan tumus təka riṅ anak: hutaṅ totovan, hutaṅ iṅ anavuṅ, hutaṅ sajəṅ, hutaṅ paṅan riṅ paṅululuṅan, hutaṅ ḍəṇḍa, hutaṅ śeṣaniṅ tukon, mati kaṅ ahutaṅ, tan yogya katagih anake deniṅ apihutaṅ, duk hana kaṅ ahutaṅ uga palakunən den-pgat.</p>
      .
      .<p n="80">
      1965riṅ hutaṅ tumus mariṅ anak: hutaṅ puputran, hutaṅ seseban, hutaṅ mañjiṅ anuṅgu, hutaṅ gənah iṅ aṅəntasakən voṅ atuva, hutaṅ deniṅ andharma voṅ atuva, kabeh ikā kapanahurana deniṅ anak, tan kavaśa yen tan sahurən iṅ anak-putu, kramane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="81">
      .riṅ voṅ huvus amanahuri hutaṅ, səbitən ikaṅ pasusuratan riṅ harəp iṅ ahutaṅ, dene kaṅ apihutaṅ, makādi yen hana sākṣi, kahuvusan iṅ hutaṅ phalane.</p>
      .
      1970<p n="82">
      .riṅ voṅ apihutaṅ, yen atəguh sareh iṅ dharmaniṅ apihutaṅ, agave vr̥ddhiniṅ mas, pirak, ujariṅ aji, iku lābhane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="83">
      .riṅ anahur hutaṅ dene kaṅ apihutaṅ nora den-səbit pasusuratane riṅ harəpiṅ ahutaṅ dene kaṅ apihutaṅ, sahuvuse anavur, yen hana maṅkana, saguṅe panahure kaṅ ahutaṅ ikā, saṅ viśeṣa riṅ bhūmi, vənaṅ ameta pihutaṅe voṅ ikā, tur ḍahutən pasusuratan riṅ kaṅ apihutaṅ, vehakəna riṅ kaṅ ahutaṅ de saṅ amava bhūmi, doṣane tan ahiḍəp iṅ dharmaśāsananiṅ apihutaṅ.</p>
      1975
      .<p n="84">
      .riṅ voṅ apihutaṅ aṅalap iṅ dr̥veniṅ ahutaṅ, yen paḍa guṅ iṅ pihutaṅ lavan guṅe kaṅ den-alap, huvus pgat iṅ hutaṅ, yen maṅkana, pasusuratane ulihakəna mariṅ kaṅ ahutaṅ, maṅkana lakṣananiṅ apihutaṅ; yen aguṅ dr̥veniṅ ahutaṅ den-alap deniṅ
      .apihutaṅ, amalekna saləvihe sakiṅ pihutaṅe ika; yen kaṅ ahutaṅ amalakuha sapaṅaləvihe hutaṅe ikā riṅ apihutaṅ, tan paveh po sapaṅləvih iṅ hutaṅ kaṅ apihutaṅ ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ viśeṣa riṅ bhūmi, tur ḍahutən saguṅ iṅ dr̥ve kaṅ den-alap ikā, ulihakəna riṅ kaṅ ahutaṅ sapaṅləvih iṅ dr̥ve, sabner iṅ hutaṅe alapən denira saṅ adr̥ve bhūmi, lavan
      .pasusuratane ulihakəna mariṅ kaṅ ahutaṅ, pgat tan pahutaṅ arane ikā, apan huvus iṅalap denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      1980
      .<p n="85">
      .riṅ anak-rabiniṅ ahutaṅ, yen rovaṅe lanaṅ, vadon, salah-tuṅgal kahaṇḍəga deniṅ apihutaṅ, yendudu trape paṅaṇḍəge, akāraṇa valat, riṅ hutaṅ maṅkana pgat, tan panahurana deniṅ ahutaṅ; tur kaṅ iṅaṇḍəg muliha, tan aveha panahur hutaṅ.</p>
      .
      .<p n="86">
      1985riṅ voṅ aṅaṅasi hutaṅ, tagihən anikəl piṅro, hana manih kaṅ sakiṅ āgama vaneh, yen satus vit dadi pataṅ atus, yen sevu vit, dadi pataṅ evu, sakehane maṅkana uga, kaliṅane saṅkane tinagih anikəl piṅpat, pinakaḍəṇḍane duk tinikəlakən piṅpat iku; hana manih voṅ anagih tan papihutaṅ, tikəlakəna piṅro sapanagihe, sahuvuse kalah aucapan, tur ḍəṇḍanən den kaya kaṅ aṅaṅasi hutaṅ ikā, yen satus panagihe, dadi pataṅ atus, yen sevu panagihe, dadi pataṅ tali, saguṅe panagihe valikakəna piṅpat denira saṅ amava bhūmi, ḍəṇḍaniṅ anagih tan papihutaṅ maṅkana.</p>
      .
      .<p n="87">
      .riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ kbo sapi, vəvənaṅ, anahura anikəl piṅro kaṅ ahutaṅ, yen təluṅ taboo lavase, yen ahutaṅ kbo sapi huvus iṅajen samulene, hananiṅ pasusuratan paṅrəgane patik-vənaṅ iṅutaṅ ikā, paḍa kalavan ahutaṅ pisis, manahurana anikəl piṅro saguṅiṅ paṅrəgane, yen tkaniṅ pataṅ tahun.</p>
      .
      1990<p n="88">
      .voṅ aṅandəlakən tan palayuhaniṅ ahutaṅ, tur malayu kaṅ ahutaṅ, yen matiya kunəṅ, amanahurana sakavit kaṅ aṅandəlakən, tan katagiha anikəl deniṅ apihutaṅ, yen mati kaṅ aṅandəlakən tan tumusa mariṅ anak-putuniṅ aṅandəlakən, yen aṅandəlakən katəmuhaniṅ pisis, mati kaṅ ahutaṅ, yen malayuha, kaṅ aṅandəlakən anahura saguṅiṅ hutaṅ, tkaniṅ putra paṅalāntara, yen lavas tan panavur, tikəlakəna piṅro saguṅiṅ hutaṅ, tur tumusa riṅ anakiṅ aṅandəlakən ikaṅ hutaṅ.</p>
      .
      .<p n="89">
      .riṅ kavulaniṅ voṅ yen lanaṅ, yen vadona, kinon anarimaha pisis, olihiṅ ahutaṅ, deniṅ gustine, dudu yen aranana aṅandəlakən ikā, tan katagiha riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon anarima pisis ikā, yen vadvaha kunəṅ, apan kevala kinonkon jati kavula, mula konkonan gavene.</p>
      1995
      .<p n="90">
      .riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ pari, yenorā kapanahuran tumuli tikəlakəna piṅlima gumuluṅ anaṅkən tahun, hiṅane mariṅ anikəl limaṅ tahun.</p>
      .
      .<p n="91">
      2000voṅ asaṇḍa vənaṅ-vənaṅ kbo sapi, amtəṅ riṅ pasaṇḍan, anakiṅ kbo sapi, kalapa dene kaṅ asasaṇḍa, nora vənaṅ kaṅ isiniṅ sasaṇḍan alapən deniṅ anaṇḍa, apan anakiṅ sasaṇḍan tan petən deniṅ anaṇḍa, kevala pagave uga pakolih iṅ anaṇḍa; maṅkana pageh iṅ saṇḍaniṅ āgama riṅ rat kabeh, tutən deniṅ loka.</p>
      .
      .<p n="92">
      .riṅ voṅ atitip vəvənaṅ, kbo sapi ādine, lavan salviriṅ dr̥ve mas, ratna ādine, manih yen sasaṇḍan, hilaṅ po deniṅ tinitipan, yen hilaṅ deniṅ anaṇḍa, tan dr̥veniṅ anaṇḍa hilaṅ, kevala kaṅ titipan lavan sasaṇḍan hilaṅ, yen maṅkana, titipan lavan sasaṇḍan əlenana deniṅ tinitipan lavan deniṅ anaṇḍa samuleniṅ dr̥ve hilaṅ ika.</p>
      .
      2005<p n="93">
      .hana ta titipan, lavan sasaṇḍan, yen iṅalap denira saṅ ratu, saṅ viśeṣamava bhūmi deśa, cinoloṅ deniṅ maliṅ, manih yen katunon, keli riṅ bañu, kabaranaṅ deniṅ corah lavan duṣṭa, yen maṅkana ta nora yogya əlenana kaṅ titipan lavan sasaṇḍan.</p>
      .
      .<p n="94">
      .hana ta voṅ aṇḍahut saṇḍa tan panahur putra kalāntara, tan anavur pavitan iṅ panaṇḍa kevala harəp tan panəbus sasaṇḍan, hiku ta doṣane: vit pisis mulihanikəl mariṅ kaṅ anaṇḍa manih rəganana ikaṅ saṇḍa, samuleniṅ saṇḍa lavan ituṅən guṅiṅ putra kalāntara, iku ta saguṅiṅ pisis huvus iṅituṅ kehe kabeh, pinakaḍəṇḍaniṅ aṇḍahut saṇḍa denira saṅ amava bhūmi;
      2010maṅkana riṅ voṅ anaṇḍa, huvus tinəbus nora aṅudalakən sasaṇḍan, samulene kaṅ sinaṇḍakən ikā pinaka dəṇḍane denira saṅ amava bhūmi, lavan saguṅ vit putra kalāntara mariṅ ḍəṇḍa, saṇḍa mulihanikəl sarəgane mariṅ kaṅ asasaṇḍa, kaliṅane paḍa doṣaniṅ aṇḍahut saṇḍa, tan harəp anahura hutaṅ, lavan voṅ anaṇḍa huvus animbali pisisaguṅ iṅ hutaṅ tkaniṅ putra kalāntara, tur nora aṅudalakən saṇḍa, karo iku adoṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="95">
      .hana po tiṅkah iṅ titipan, yen sasaṇḍan kunəṅ, maləra uga riṅ gənahe, den-abəcik asimpən, den-prayatna kaṅ anaṇḍa, nora dadi vicara vkase, pradenipun, yan kadeśabhaṅgabhaya, riṅ sasaṇḍan hilaṅ, kadeśabhaṅgabhaya arane, rusak deśa deniṅ papəraṅanira saṅ ratu paḍa ratu.</p>
      .
      2015<p n="96">
      .tiṅkah iṅ adol atuku ucapən maṅke. riṅ voṅ atuku dr̥veniṅ voṅ, yen kbo-sapiba salvire vənaṅ-vənaṅ, huvus den-pisisi deniṅ atuku, duruṅ den-alap, lagi malər iṅ kaṅ adol, nora den-pet tumuli dene kaṅ atuku, vəkasan mati kaṅ vənaṅ-vənaṅ, yen hilaṅa kunəṅ, tan yogya palakunən pisis panuku ikā deniṅ atuku. kapaten tukon arane ujar iṅ aji, yen den·alap sakiṅ prakaśa valat ikaṅ patuku deniṅ atuku, yen aucapan, kalahakəna kaṅ atuku, pisis den-ulibakəna anikəl mariṅ adol.</p>
      .
      .<p n="97">
      .riṅ dr̥ve huvus dinol, malər hana riṅ adol kaṅ tinuku ikā, lāgi duruṅ katimbalan deniṅ atuku, vəkasan cinoloṅ deniṅ matiṅ, iṅalap deniṅ ratu kaṅ dinol ikā, ikā tatan palakunən deniṅ atuku riṅ kaṅ adol, bnəre paḍa kelaṅan muliha satṅah pisis iṅ atuku, yen tan ahiḍəp karo kaṅ atuku kalavan kaṅ adol paḍa laṅghana riṅ śāsana, yen salah saviji rikā tan ahiḍəp, dəṇḍanən karo doṣa roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tur alapən pisise patuku ikā.</p>
      2020
      .<p n="98">
      .voṅ asaṇḍa vəvənaṅ makādi ajaran sakehiṅ asuku papat, lavan asuku roro, makādi bañak yen lagi anom, duruṅ hana gavene yen maṅkana, kaṅ anaṇḍakən aveha kalāntara saputraniṅ pisis, kunəṅ yen asaṇḍa kavula lanaṅ vadon duruṅ bhiṣanambut gave, kaṅ
      .anaṇḍakən aveha paṅan sapaha riṅ satahun knana leler arane, iya iku saṇḍa tinitipakən.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      2025 <!--

      .@@C (le3):

      .@@H (edH):
      . -->
      2035<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="99">
      .riṅ voṅ anaṇḍakən paṅaṅgo, vastra ləvih yan livat sakiṅ limaṅ tahun, lələb, tan palakunən deniṅ anaṇḍakən.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      . <!--

      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      2050<p n="100">
      .yen voṅ anaṇḍakən

      2060</app>
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#le3 #lo1 #edj #edh">tan lələb</lem>

      .</app>
      ., apan
      .<app>

      .saṅ prabhu
      .<app>

      .ikā, maləra uga riṅ
      .<app>

      .anaṇḍa.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      2085 <!--
      .@@A (le1): ri voṁ hanḍakən kavula la[25v3]naṁ vadon·, yen livat sakiṁ sadaśa tahun· lavase, L̥L̥b·, paḍana lavan dinolika:, yen aR̥p anəbusa kaṅ asanda, vnaṁ tan vehakna deniṁ hanaṇda:, yen miṅgata maniḥ kaṁ sinaṇda[fn: 26][26r1]kən ika:, savuvuse L̥L̥b·, ma:tiha kunəṁ, nora yogya tagiḥhən kaṅ asasaṇda:,
      .@@B (le2): riṁ vo- [20-12]ṅ anaṇḍakən kavula lanaṁ vadon·, yen livat sakiṁ sadaśa tahun lavase, [20-13]L̥L̥b·, pada kalavan dinol·. qika:, yen aR̥p anbusa kaṅ asasaṇḍa, vnaṁ [20-14]tan vehakna deniṁṅ anaṇḍa, yen miṅgata maniḥ kaṁ sinaṇḍakən ika:, savuhu- [20-15]se L̥L̥b·, mati ya kunəṁ, nora yogya tagihən kaṅ asasaṇḍa ,, 0 ,,
      .@@C (le3): riṁ voṁṅ anaṇḍakən kavula lanaṁ vadon·, ye- [28-24]n livat sakiṁ sadaśa tahun· lavase, L̥L̥b·, paḍa la- [28-25]van dinol ika:, yen aR̥p a:nəbusa kaṁ sasaṇḍan·, vnaṁ IMG_0105 <pb n="29"/><fw n="29" place="top-right"><num value="29">29</num></fw> [29-01]tan vehakna deniṁṅ anaṇḍa:, yen miṅgata maniḥ voṁ kaṁ sina- [29-02]ṇḍa:kən ika: sahuvuse L̥L̥b· mati ya kunəṁ, nora yo- [29-03]<margin hand="roman">114</margin>gya tagihən kaṅ asasaṇḍa:.
      .@@L (lo1): riṁ voṁ hanaṇḍakən kahula: lanaṁ va:don·, yen livat sa- [37r4]kiṁ saḍeśa tavun· lavase, L̥L̥b·, paḍa kalavan dinol ika:, yen aR̥p anəbuṣa: kaṅ a:sasaṇḍa, vnaṁ tan veha:kna deniṁ hanaṇḍa, yen miṅgata: maniḥ, kaṁ sinaṇḍakən ika:, savuvuse L̥L̥b·, maśiha kunəṁ, nora: yogya tagihən· kaṅ asasaṇḍa || 0 ||
      2090@@M (ma1): riṁ voṅ anaṇḍa kahula lanaṁ vadon·, yen livar [29v1] ṣakiṁ śaḍasa tahun lavase, L̥L̥b·, paḍa kalavan dinol ika:, yen aR̥p anəbu[SH]sa kaṅ asasaṇḍa, vnaṅ aveha tan aveha kna deniṁ hanaṇḍa, yen miṅgata: §[29v2] maniḥ kaṁ sinaṇḍa, savuhuse L̥L̥b·, matiya kunəṁ, nora yogya: tagihən kaṅ a[SH]sasaṇḍa,,
      .@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁ hanaṇḍa kahula lanaṁ vadon·, yan livat sakiṁ limaṁ ta- [12v-16]vun· L̥L̥b·, hika yan aR̥p anəbusa kaṅ asasaṇḍan·, vnaṁ tan ve- [12v-17]ha deniṁ hanaṇḍa, yen miṅgata maniḥ kaṁ sinanḍakən hika, savuvu- [12v-18]se L̥L̥b· mati kunəṁ nora yogya tagihana kaṁ hasasaṇḍa [12v-19],, 0 ,,
      .@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ anaṇḍakən kavula lanaṅ vadon, yen livat sakiṅ sadaśa tahun lavase, lələb paḍakna lāvan dinol ikā, yen harəp anəbusa kaṅ asasaṇḍa, vənaṅ tan vehakna deniṅ anaṇḍa, yen miṅgata manih kaṅ sinaṇḍakən ikā, sahuvuse lələb, matiha kunəṅ, nora yogya tagihən kaṅ asasaṇḍa.
      .@@H (edH): riṅ voṅ anaṇḍakən kavula lanaṅ vadon, yen livat sakiṅ sadaśa tahun lavase, lələb, paḍakna lāvan dinol ikā, yen harəp anəbusa kaṅ asasaṇḍa, vənaṅ tan vehakna deniṅ anaṇḍa, yen miṅgata manih kaṅ sinaṇḍakən ikā, savuvuse lələb, matiha kunəṅ, nora yogya tagihən kaṅ asasaṇḍa.
      . -->
      2095<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<p n="101">
      .riṅ voṅ
      . <app>
      . <lem wit="#le2 #le3 #lo1 #edj #edh">anaṇḍakən</lem>
      2100 <rdg wit="#le1">anḍakən</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#ma1 #ja1">anaṇḍa</rdg>
      .</app>
      .kavula lanaṅ vadon, yen
      .<app>
      2105 <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ja1 #edj #edh">livat</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#ma1">livar</rdg>
      .</app>
      .sakiṅ
      .<app>
      2110 <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #ma1 #edj #edh">sadaśa</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#lo1">saḍeśa</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#ja1">limaṅ</rdg>
      .</app>
      .tahun
      2115<app>
      . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">lavase</lem>
