      .
      3720-->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #ja1 #edj -->
      .<p n="206">
      .kaṅ tan vənaṅ hilaṅa, sasaṇḍan ləmah, dr̥veniṅ rarā, dr̥ve titipaniṅ voṅ vadon, dr̥venira saṅ ratu, dr̥venira saṅ vatək aṅaji, lavasane tan hilaṅ, nora kəna riṅ kadaśavarṣa ikā.</p>
      .
      3725<p n="207">
      .<unclear>kaṅ</unclear> yogya titipana dr̥veniṅ voṅ, lvire voṅ aruhur kavaṅśane, voṅ rahayu lakune, voṅ vəruh riṅ dharma, voṅ satya riṅ ujarya voṅ mahāpavitra, voṅ sugih yan harəp, guhaniṅ titip dr̥ve; liṅ saṅ paṇḍita.</p>
      .
      .<p n="208">
      .riṅ dr̥ve ti<unclear>ni</unclear>tipakən kamaliṅan, keli riṅ <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="79"/>
      3730 bañu, katunon, pinet denira saṅ amava bhūmi, binaranaṅ iṅ corah, nora vənaṅ aṅlenana kaṅ tini<unclear>ti</unclear>pan, kaṅ atitip tan malakuha.</p>
      .
      .<p n="209">
      .riṅ voṅ tini<unclear>ti</unclear>pan, yen mati kaṅ atitip tan pakaki, tan panini, tan pabapa, tan pababu, tan panak-anak, tan pakaponakan, tan anarva sanak amisan, amiṅro, iku <unclear>ikaṅ</unclear> iṅaran pratyantara kabeh tan hana, tan ulihakəna riṅ dr̥vya, patitip deniṅ tinitipan, yen mati kaṅ tinitipan nora hilaṅ ikaṅ dr̥veniṅ pratyantara, apan lagi ahurip kaṅ atitip tan panak-anak ikā, vehən dr̥ve patitip ikā deniṅ anakiṅ tinitipan riṅ pratyantara <app>
      .<lem>iṅkana</lem>
      3735<rdg wit="#J">ikā, yen maṅkana</rdg>
      .</app>tan <app>
      .<lem>saṅgratana</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">saṅgrahana?</rdg>
      .</app> denira saṅ amava bhūmi dene anakiṅ tinitipan aṅulihakən iṅ titipan, tan ucapən kadaṅ-varganiṅ tinitipan, tan vənaṅ tan paṅulihakəna titipan.</p>
      3740
      .<p n="210">
      .riṅ amalaku dr̥ve titipan tan <app>
      .<lem>vanehakən</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">vinehakən</rdg>
      3745</app> deniṅ voṅ kaṅ tinitipan, hana manih voṅ apakṣa amalaku titipan, tur tan atitip karo riṅ voṅ maṅkana, corah arane, konən adevāgamaha de saṅ prabhu, devāgama arane acora, yen duk atitip lāva<unclear>n</unclear>
      .<supplied reason="unknown">siṅ</supplied> tinitipan tan pasākṣi kaṅ susākṣi, yen kəna riṅ devāgama pasore, mulihanikəl piṅro sapaṅakune riṅ dr̥ve ikā, maṅkana manih ḍəṇḍane saguṅ <unclear>iṅ u</unclear>lih-ul<unclear>i</unclear>hane dr̥vene ikā denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="211">
      .riṅ titipan katiṅgal, akāraṇa deniṅ deśa rusak binahak deniṅ voṅ, geger deniṅ ratu apraṅ paḍa ratu, iṅalap iṅ maliṅ, katunon, keli riṅ bañu, tan paṅəlenana kaṅ tinitipan yen maṅkana, pan kapañcasādhāraṇa arane, liṅira saṅ paṇḍita vruh iṅ āgamā.</p>
      3750
      .<p n="212">
      .riṅ voṅ anilih dr̥veniṅ voṅ <app>
      .<lem>cikolikan</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">cinolikan</rdg>
      3755</app> iṅalap deniṅ maliṅ, aṅəlenana samuleniṅ dr̥ve ikā kaṅ anilih, <app>
      .<lem>aleñge</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">aleṅe?</rdg>
      .</app> aran iṅ anilih maṅkana. <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="80"/>
      .</p>
      3760
      .<p n="213">
      .riṅ rarā viśeṣa kavoṅane, huvus vinehan tukon deniṅ jajaka, tumuli jajaka iku aṅucap aṅuṅsi dharma, lavan aṅucap aṅulati art<unclear>h</unclear>āh, tiṅgal tukon<unclear>e</unclear> jajaka ikā, liñok ujar iṅ jajaka ikā, <app>
      .<lem>makidi</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">makādi</rdg>
      3765</app> yen saṅ dvija, kapaten iṅ dharma
      .arane, tiniṇḍa riṅ rarā yen maṅkana, deniṅ tukon petən deniṅ rarā ikā uga, tan muliha mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve panuku strīdhana arane sakiṅ āgama.</p>
      .
      .<p n="214">
      .riṅ rarā huvus vinehan paṅlaraṅ deniṅ jajaka, akeh, voṅ vəruh yen kalivat sakiṅ limaṅ vulan lavase paṅlaraṅ ikā, nora vənaṅ udalən manih ikaṅ paṅlaraṅ deniṅ jajaka, vulañjar aran iṅ rarā <supplied reason="unknown">arane</supplied> liṅ iṅ loka, vənaṅ rarā ikā vehana riṅ len dene rāmane.</p>
      3770
      .<p n="215">
      .riṅ rarā huvus vinehan tukon deniṅ jajaka vəkasan mati jajaka, yen hana arine lanaṅ jajaka ikā, vənaṅ vehakəna riṅ arine ikā devarahara arane, karəpana ikā deniṅ vərə-vərəh ariniṅ mati, vərə-vərəh arane jajaka.</p>
      .
      .<p n="216">
      3775riṅ atuku aveh pamañjər, kaṅ aveh pamañjər nora təka riṅ pasaṅketane, kaṅ den-tuku vənaṅ hayo vehana, tur pamañjəre hilaṅa; riṅ tutukon hana doṣane, hana hala pinakavadane, tan den-varahakən dene kaṅ adol, kaṅ tinuku maṅsul, pisis panuku mulihanikəl piṅro.</p>
      .
      .<p n="217">
      .riṅ voṅ añjuraṅ ləmah iṅ ləmah, aṅurugi talaga, rava, sivakan, sumur, tan pakon iṅ adr̥ve, ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, kaṅ riku.</p>
      .
      3780<p n="220">a
      .riṅ pāruṣya ucapən maṅke. riṅ kṣatriya <app>
      .<lem>aṅamanuman</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">aṅuman-uman</rdg>
      .</app> brāhmaṇa, ḍəṇḍanən saṅ kṣatriya roṅ tali, yen vaiśya aṅuman-uman iṅ saṅ brāhmaṇa, ḍəṇḍanən ikaṅ vaiśya limaṅ tali, vaiśya arane voṅ tani, śūdra aṅuman-uman iṅ saṅ brāhmaṇa, doṣaniṅ <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="81"/>
      3785 śūdra doṣa pati, patyanana riṅ voṅ adagaṅ aṅuman-uman iṅ saṅ brāhmaṇa de saṅ prabhu; saṅ brāhmaṇa yen aṅuman-uman iṅ saṅ kṣatriya, ḍəṇḍanən saṅ brāhmaṇa, <unclear>a</unclear>ṅuman-uman iṅ voṅ tani, ḍəṇḍanen saṅ brāhmaṇa limaṅ atus, brāhmaṇa aṅuman-uman iṅ voṅ adāgaṅ, saṅ brāhmaṇa ḍəṇḍanən satak save; sak pahayunən manih.</p>
      .
      .<p n="218">
      .riṅ voṅ amiḍik pomahan, talaga, rava, savah, kali, bəbəṅan, taman, tgal, ḍəṇḍane salakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen sakiṅ tan-vruhe, ḍəṇḍane pataṅ tali, kaṅ den-piḍik muliha kadi duk alavas, yen hana bhuktine, tagihən teluṅ pañaraṅ, yen alavas.</p>
      .
      3790<p n="219">
      .riṅ voṅ kasərəṅən aṅuman-uman iṅ voṅ len aṅavakən malaniṅ avak, aṅavatakən śirah, paṅan, laku, solah, tojanman, kavoṅan, aṅavatakən kagunan, aji, riṅ voṅ maṅkana vākpāruṣya arane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="220">b
      .riṅ pāruṣya ucapən maṅke. riṅ kṣatriya aṅuman-uman brāhmaṇa de saṅ prabhu, saṅ brāhmaṇa, yen aṅuman-uman iṅ kṣatriya, ḍəṇḍaniṅ brāhmaṇa sevu, saṅ brāhmaṇa aṅuman-uman voṅ tani, ḍəṇḍanən saṅ brāhma<unclear>ṇa</unclear> limaṅ atus, brahmaṇa aṅuman-uman iṅ voṅ adagaṅ, saṅ brāhmaṇa ḍəṇḍanən satak save.</p>
      3795
      .<p n="221">
      .riṅ voṅ aṅuman-uman voṅ paḍa kula-kavoṅane, kaṅ aṅuman-uman ḍəṇḍanən satak salave; maṅkana ajar iṅ śāstra.</p>
      .
      .<p n="222">
      3800yen saṅ kṣatriya aṅuman-uman iṅ voṅ tani, ḍəṇḍaniṅ saṅ kṣatriya sevu, riṅ voṅ tani aṅuman-uman iṅ bot <supplied reason="omitted">da</supplied>dagaṅ, ḍəṇḍaniṅ voṅ tani sevu, ḍəṇḍaniṅ voṅ tan<unclear>i</unclear> aṅuman-uman iṅ kṣatriya ḍəṇḍanən ikaṅ voṅ tani roṅ eyu <unclear>evu</unclear>.
      .</p>
      .
      .<p n="223">
      .riṅ bot dagaṅ aṅuman-uman iṅ kṣatriya, ḍəṇḍaniṅ bot dagaṅ limaṅ tali, riṅ voṅ tani iṅuman-uman <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="82"/>
      3805 deniṅ bot dagaṅ, ḍəṇḍaniṅ bot dagaṅ roṅ tali.</p>
      .
      .<p n="224">
      .riṅ voṅ nīca caṇḍālajanma aṅuman-uman iṅ saṅ brāhmaṇa, riṅ saṅ paṇḍita, patenana kaṅ voṅ nīca cāṇḍāla de saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      3810<p n="225">
      .ḍəṇḍapāruṣya ucapən maṅke. riṅ voṅ amukul, anuduk iṅ kayu, aṅgitikiṅ vatu aṅlarani, aṅəmu gətih, atatuha kunəṅ, anugəlakən, anikəlakən baluṅ, makādi yen amatenana sarvasato, yen voṅ ādine, araniṅ ulah vivijinən, salah tuṅgala ikā ḍəṇḍapāruṣya arane, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, maṅkana riṅ voṅ amraṅ iṅ sañjata, anuduk ādine, aṅgitik iṅ vatu, riṅ viṅkā, amukul iṅ kayu, riṅ baluṅ, anaṇḍat guluniṅ len iṅ tatali, aniləpakən iṅ bañu, anampel, amərəp, aṅgarut, anəpak, andədəl, <app>
      .<lem>aṅgoñoh</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">aṅgocoh</rdg>
      .</app>, aṅgapuk, anahuthamok, amlaciṅ, aṅidoni, <app>
      3815<lem>aniratra ambal</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">anirati umbəl</rdg>
      .</app> ilu, anampəki kəkəmahan, anampəki ririgən, aṅgutuk iṅ tai, aṅantepakən iṅ tai, anuṇḍuṅakən iṅ tai, riṅ patunan iṅ celeṅ, iku pratyekaniṅ ḍəṇḍapāruṣya.</p>
      .
      .<p n="226">
      3820riṅ bot dagaṅ aṅlarani riṅ brāhmaṇa, asādhana taṅan, suku, caṅkəm, śirah, ḍaḍa, gigir, bāhu, plat, <app>
      .<lem>silip</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">silit</rdg>
      .</app> iku ta sādhanane pāruṣya riṅ samajanma ləvih kaṅ den-pāruṣyani, siṅ sādhanane aṇḍamalani, tu<supplied reason="omitted">ṅ</supplied>gelana de saṅ prabhu, maṅkana liṅ bha<unclear>ga</unclear>vā<unclear>n</unclear> manu riṅ śāsana.</p>
      .
      3825<p n="227">
      .riṅ śūdra, makādi riṅ cāṇḍālajati aṅrəṅguk śirah saṅ brāhmaṇa tugəlana taṅane denira saṅ prabhu, yen andədəl iṅ suku, ikaṅ cāṇḍāla śūdra tugəlana sukune denira saṅ prabhu.</p>
      .
      .<p n="228">
      .riṅ cāṇḍāla <unclear>śūdra</unclear> aṅluṅguhi kaluṅguhanira saṅ brāhmaṇa, ikaṅ cāṇḍāla śūdra praṅən vaṅkiṅ-vaṅkiṅnya denira saṅ prabhu.</p>
      3830
      .<p n="229">
      .yen iṅ śūdra cāṇḍāla aṅuyuhi riṅ saṅ brāhmaṇa <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="83"/>
      . ikaṅ cāṇḍāla śūdra tugəlana plate, yen ikaṅ cāṇḍāla śūdra hamivakarpyiṅ, amiji<supplied reason="omitted">ṅ</supplied>t iruṅ amumuṇḍak, aṅgutuk iṅ tai, añjəṅkaṅakən, aṅantəpakən iṅ tai, ikaṅ śūdra cāṇḍāla tugəlana taṅane, yen ikaṅ śūdra cāṇḍāla aṅissiṅ<unclear>h</unclear>i riṅ saṅ brāhmaṇa, duləkən iṅ vsi abaṅ <app>
      .<lem>hilihe</lem>
      3835<rdg wit="#edj">silite</rdg>
      .</app>, yen amləciṅ tugəlana plate lavan taṅane denira saṅ prabhu.</p>
      .
      .<p n="230">
      .yen hana voṅ pāruṣya akāraṇa kakayu, vatu dene aṅlarani, patikiven makādi ye<unclear>n a</unclear>ṅlarani voṅ, sasḍəṅniṅ dukhane kaṅ den arani, pinatut lavan guṅ lit iṅ ḍəṇḍa denira saṅ adr̥ve bhūmi amrayogakən ḍəṇḍa, yenora pati alara dene amraṅ, amukul, aṅgatuk den alit ḍəṇḍane limaṅ atus, yen madhyama kanin ḍəṇḍa sevu<supplied reason="omitted">s</supplied>, yen uttama kanin <unclear>t</unclear>əka riṅ baluṅ makādi, yen tikəl, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa, yen abaṅ kulite emu, aṅəmu gətih, ḍəṇḍa roṅ tali, tur voṅ pāruṣya apatiba jampi, patuku tamba, hiṅana savarase tatu kaṅ <unclear>den-</unclear>pāruṣyani<supplied reason="omitted">n</supplied>.
      3840</p>
      .
      .<p n="231">
      .riṅ voṅ aṅrəməkakən dr̥veniṅ voṅ, anikəlakən, aṅgəmpalakən, anigarakən, akāraṇa tivase, tan vəruh dene aṅgutuk, amukul, amraṅ dr̥veniṅ para kaṅ rusak ikā, kaṅ kagutuk, kagitik <supplied reason="omitted">ikā</supplied> kapraṅ <unclear>ikā</unclear> mulihanikəl piṅro, aṅlenana susukhan riṅ adr̥ve den-muli<unclear>h</unclear> kayeṅ kuna, maṅkana ḍəṇḍane denira saṅ amava bhūmi, guṅ iṅ ḍəṇḍa den-paḍa lavan əlen-əlen kaṅ rinusakaṅ tikəl.</p>
      .
      3845<p n="232">
      .riṅ voṅ anuṅgaṅ paḍati, ye<unclear>n a</unclear>jarana tinuṅgaṅan kunəṅ, sakalviraniṅ tuṅgaṅtinuṅaṅan, aṅgəpok aṅidəki voṅ, yen mati voṅ ikā kaṅ den-gəpok, den-idək ikā, kaṅ anuṅgaṅ yen kaṅ asarathi kunəṅ, ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tur aveha pamidāra voluṅ tali riṅ kaṅ adr̥ve <app>
      .<lem>sovaṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">rovaṅ</rdg>
      .</app> yen iṅ kadaṅ-varganiṅ mati, gənahaniṅ aveh. <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="84"/>
      3850</p>
      .
      .<p n="233">
      .yen aṅidək sapi, yen aṅidəki ajaran, yen uṣṭra mati den-idəki ikā, kaṅ <app>
      .<lem>asarami</lem>
      3855<rdg wit="#edj">asarath</rdg>
      .</app> ḍəṇḍanən salakṣa <app>
      .<lem>vur</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">tur</rdg>
      .</app> aṅəlenana sarəgane, samajanane kaṅ mati ikā.</p>
      3860
      .<p n="234">
      .yen alit sāpi kaṅ mati ikā, yen ajarana, yen uṣṭraha ḍəṇḍaniṅ asarathi pataṅ tali, aṅidəki āyam, bebek ikā kaṅ linumbatan, cinaṅcaṅ, ḍəṇḍa limaṅ atus, aṅidəki ayam iṅ bobotoriṅ caṅcaṅan, riṅ kuruṅan, ḍəṇḍa satali.</p>
      .
      .<p n="235">
      3865aṅidəki<supplied reason="omitted">ṅ</supplied> vḍus vivi, vḍus padu, bañak, ḍəṇḍaniṅ asarathi roṅ tali, yen aṅidəki<supplied reason="omitted">ṅ</supplied> camra, celeṅ ḍəṇḍa patāṅ tali, tur aṅəlenana sapama<unclear>ja</unclear>n<unclear>e</unclear> rəgane kaṅ kedəkan ikā.</p>
      .
      .<p n="236">
      .riṅ rabi, anak, kavula lanaṅ, kavula vadon, sanakunəṅ, yan śiṣya, saudara ikā arane kabeh yen adoṣa, salah saviji katkana doṣa, təmbaṅən iṅ priṅ savilah, yen tinəmbaṅen iṅ tatali kunəṅ kaṅ tinəmbuṅ gigire, ləṅəne, pupune, bobokoṅe, hayo tinəmbuṅ śirahe, yen tinəmbuṅ śirah aguṅ doṣa salah saviji, dene gənahe adoṣa ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      3870<p n="237">
      .riṅ voṅ añoloṅ ivak iṅ tambak manih yen larane, ḍəṇḍaniṅ añoloṅ voluṅ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen akeh kaṅ añoloṅ vivijinen amoluṅ tali riṅ voṅ <unclear>s</unclear>atuṅgal-tuṅgal, tur ivak kaṅ deñ-coloṅ mulihanikəl piṅro, yen vəṅi kāla dene añoloṅ patenana <app>
      .<lem>uba</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">uga</rdg>
      .</app> doṣane.</p>
      3875
      .<p n="238">
      .riṅ voṅ añoloṅ pari, ləvih sakiṅ sapuluh tənah olihe añoloṅ patenana denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen sapuluh tənah dene añoloṅ pari tikəlakəna piṅsavlas, ḍəṇḍane mariṅ saṅ amava bhūmi, pari kaṅ den-coloṅ mulihanikəl piṅro mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve pari cinoloṅ, yen vəṅi māsane añoloṅ patenana uga denira saṅ amava bhūmi. <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="85"/>
      .<!--% riṅ kaṅ adr̥ve pari: this string is printed in italics.--></p>
      .
      3880<p n="239">
      .riṅ voṅ añoloṅ kəmbaṅ, añoloṅ pari yen akəḍik olihe, bobotana, savərate bobote atikəlakəna <app>
      .<lem>piṅlavlas</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">piṅsavlas</rdg>
      .</app>, riṅ añoloṅ gaṅan, kuni<unclear>r</unclear>, təmu, gamoṅan, añoloṅ priṅ, añoloṅ odod-ododan, bubuṅkaban, akəḍik olihe añoloṅ, tan mule pañoloṅe, ḍəṇḍanən satak denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tur olihe añoloṅ <app>
      3885<lem>əka</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">ikā</rdg>
      .</app>, mulihanikəl mariṅ kaṅ cinoloṅan.
      . <!--% riṅ: the first word of this section is printed in italics.--></p>
      .
      3890<p n="240">
      .riṅ voṅ añoloṅ mās, manih añoloṅ ratna, yen añoloṅ dodot, yen ləvih sakiṅ haji satus doṣa patiniṅ añoloṅ denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen ləvih <unclear>sakiṅ</unclear> haji save, dr̥ve kaṅ de<unclear>n</unclear>-coloṅ ikā tugəlana taṅane riṅ kaṅ añoloṅ denira saṅ adr̥ve bhūmi, yen dur<unclear>u</unclear>ṅ sakiṅ haji save kaṅ den-coloṅ ikā, tikəlakəna savlas, samuleniṅ dr̥ve den-coloṅ ikā ḍəṇḍanə<unclear>n</unclear> denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tur olihe añoloṅ <app>
      .<lem>kikelakna</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">tikəlakəna</rdg>
      .</app> piṅro mariṅ <app>
      3895<lem>taṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">kaṅ</rdg>
      .</app> adr̥ve<supplied reason="omitted">ne</supplied> kaṅ cinoloṅan.</p>
      .
      .<p n="241">
      3900riṅ voṅ auoloṅ sajəṅ riṅ umah, añoloṅ skul añoloṅ kəklan, añoloṅ ivak mtah rateṅ añoloṅ manuk<supplied reason="omitted">a</supplied>, añoloṅ miñak, añoloṅ lṅa, añoloṅ madhu, <app>
      .<lem>pdan</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">pəhan</rdg>
      .</app>, ma<supplied reason="omitted">h</supplied>lam, pulut, <supplied reason="omitted">tut</supplied>, gagaraṅan, kuvuk, laṇḍak, yen haneṅ umah den-coloṅ, akāraṇa harəpe riṅ iya, manih añoloṅ anam-anaman .. makādi raga, kicir, yen lagi riṅ umah, añoloṅ guci, piṅgan sakeh iṅ vavaḍah vigil pa .. n, kəṇḍi kunəṅ, añoloṅ uyah, tarasi <app>
      .<lem>asəs</lem>
      3905<rdg wit="#edj">asəm</rdg>
      .</app>
      .<app>
      .<lem>prak</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">vrak</rdg>
      3910</app>, jruk, sahananiṅ raragi haneṅ umah manih añoloṅ bhasmara avu, arəṅ ikā, kaṅ den-coloṅ salah tuṅgala, makādi bras riṅ pasimpənan den-coloṅ, kaṅ añoloṅ, ḍəṇḍanən samulane rəgane kaṅ den-coloṅ ikā tikəlakəna pi<unclear>ṅ</unclear>ṇḍo, tur kaṅ den-coloṅ mulihanikəl mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve, ḍəṇḍa anikəl piṅro sarəgane mariṅ saṅ amava bhūmi.
      .<!-- %anam-anaman .. makādi: the string man .. mak is printed in italics.--></p>
      .
      .<p n="242">
      .riṅ voṅ aṅivat voṅ ṅahabika voṅ vadon <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="86"/>
      3915 ləvih, añoloṅ ratna ləvih patenana kaṅ añoloṅ ikā denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="243">
      .yen hana voṅ añoloṅ kbo sa<supplied reason="omitted">m</supplied>pi, paṅiridira saṅ ləvih, makādi saṅ amava bhūmi kaṅ adṛ<unclear>ve</unclear> paṅirid, yen añoloṅ guguluniṅ paḍati, kaṅ <app>
      .<lem>añoluṅ</lem>
      3920<rdg wit="#edj">añoloṅ</rdg>
      .</app> tugəlana sukune satəṅah denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
      .
      .<p n="244">
      .riṅ voṅ sāhasa aṅrusāk <app>
      3925<lem>graha</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">gṛha</rdg>
      .</app>nira saṅ ləvih, aṅrusak titiṅkahanira saṅ amava bhūmi aṅrusak gənah iṅ sañjata, aṅrusakabuyutan, amalat gajah, amalat ajaran, ratha paṅiridira saṅ amava bhūmi den-valat <app>
      .<lem>aṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="edj">iṅ</rdg>
      3930</app> voṅ, ikā ta kaṅ amalat patenana denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tan rasanana, yen harəp ahuripa kaṅ amalat ikā, yen iṅapura denira saṅ amava bhūmi ḍəṇḍan ikā denira salima deniṅ voṅ maṅkana.</p>
      .
      .<p n="245">
      .riṅ guru, riṅ rare, riṅ voṅ atuva vayahe, riṅ brāhmaṇa, riṅ voṅ vatək aṅaji, kunəṅ sakalviraniṅ kaṅ sinəṅguh saṅ paṇḍita, liṅniṅ loka, yen ātatāyi, sa<supplied reason="omitted">sa</supplied>cihna sayakti ulahe, paran ta kaṅ ātatāyi iṅaranan? voṅ anunoni umah iṅ voṅ, makādi anunoni umahira saṅ amava bhūmi, riṅ voṅ aṅupasi sasamane voṅ, riṅ voṅ anəluh sasamane voṅ, riṅ voṅ aṅamuk, amiśunakən saṅ amava bhūmi, riṅ voṅ amurugul, kaṅ nəm iku tan yogya huripən denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tan raṣanana patine, yen sacihna sadoṣa, yen sira amateni voṅ ātatāyi ikā, tan kataman pāpapātaka sira, maṅkana kapagəhanira riṅ dharmanira saṅ amava bhūmi.
      . <!--%yogya: this word is printed in italics.--></p>
      3935
      .<p n="246">
      .riṅ voṅ aṅgaməli rabiniṅ arabi, tugəlana taṅane kaṅ aṅgaməli denira saṅ amava bhūmi, iku ḍəṇḍane, tur cihnanana tuṇḍuṅen sakiṅ deśanira, iku tətəṅəre, yen aṅgaməli rabiniṅ voṅ.</p>
      .
      .<p n="247">
      3940riṅ voṅ aṅucap-ucap lavan rabiniṅ arabi, riṅ śunya riṅ taman, riṅ alas, riṅ kali, <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="87"/>
      . sagənahane aṅucap-ucap <app>
      .<lem>uṣ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">uga?</rdg>
      .</app> kikivan uga hana səmune mariṅ voṅ vadon ikā, naṅiṅ tan kalavanan deniṅ vadon, voṅ vadon ikā tan istri rabiniṅ arabi, tan kapiṅhit, <supplied reason="omitted">kiṅ</supplied> anəmoni guyu, <app>
      3945<lem>aṅujarvatiṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">aṅujivati</rdg>
      .</app> strīsaṅgrahaṇa arane, ḍəṇḍanən kaṅ anəmoni guyu ikā limaṅ tali, saṅkane <app>
      .<lem>aṇḍik</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">akəḍik</rdg>
      3950</app> ḍəṇḍane, rehiṅ voṅ vadon tan kapiṅhit, dudu laraṅan iṅ uttamajanma.</p>
      .
      .<p n="248">
      .riṅ voṅ aṅucap-ucap lavan rabiniṅ voṅ tumul<unclear>i</unclear> kapiṅ<unclear>h</unclear>it dene lakine voṅ uttamajanma, <app>
      .<lem>iku</lem>
      3955<rdg wit="#edj">strī</rdg>
      .</app>saṅgrahaṇa arane...</p>
      .
      .<p n="249">yen aṅucap-ucap kararaṅguhan iṅ asəpi, aṅhiṅ dene ararasan ika, tan akāraṇa sakiṅ harəp iṅ voṅ vadon ikā, tan asəmu paṅucap-ucap iṅ basaja, kevala sakiṅ tan vəruhe riṅ laki, riṅ voṅ maṅkana ḍəṇḍanən limaṅ tali, doṣane [BR464 lacuna begins] strīsaṅgrahaṇa kalilane (corr. kaliṅane) riṅ voṅ lanaṅ lavan voṅ vadon, yen ujar iṅ śāstra, tan vənaṅ yen asapocapana riṅ asəpi, lavan rabiniṅ arabi, yen rabihaniṅ sanak, rabihaniṅ paman, uva kunəṅ, rabihaniṅ anakmantu sakalviraniṅ stri laraṅan, tan yogya rovaṅaniṅ sapocapan riṅ asəpi, tan ulahanira saṅ vəruh iṅ haṅ (corr. saṅ hyaṅ) āgama, apan maṅkana dharmaniṅ dadi jahaṅət iṅ brahma.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      3960 <!--
      .@@A (le1): riṁ voṁṅ amahugi [65r2] ribiniṅ arabi niṅi, lavan amahugi laraṅaniṁṅ alaraṅan·, hamahugiha ri kavula dasiḥnira saṁ [SH] L̥viḥ makadi kavulanira saṁṅ amava bumi, hamahugi pinahu{ui ga}gi deniṁ voṁ vadon·, hakaraṇa pa[65r3]da kaR̥pe, kaṁ den-pahugenən burat·, kəmbaṁ, suvəṁ, hala-hali, ladi panunuratan·, pa[SH]ṅririṅgitan·, dodot·, buṣaṇa, sapaveveh iṁ hamahugi haga paveḥvehe kaṁ lanaṁ, ma[65r4]niḥ pavevehe kaṁ vadon ika, katmu hasisivo lavan· voṁ vadon· ṅ aspi, makadi yen haṅguguṇananana, hiku strisaṅgrahana harane, dəṇda pati doṣane, maṅkana dopa[65v1]ne liṁ saṁ paṇḍita,,

      .<!-- %doṣana: doṣa?-->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #edj -->
      .<!--
      .@@A (le1): riṁ voṁṅ abji(k)-kula kajatine, hiṅuṅgahan ḍeniṁ rara, tan ḍoṣanana kaṁṅ iṅu{ui ṅḍu}ṅgahan ika denira saṅ amava bumi,, riṁ vo hasor kajatane, sor kulane, hiṅaṅgahaniṁ rara parame[65v2]nakajatine, pisaḥhakna rara hika lavan kaṁ den-uṅgahi, huvus apisaḥ, takonana denira [SH] voṁṅ-atuvane rara hika yen ḍudu kaR̥pe mantu voṁ lanaṁ sor kulane hika, patenana ⌈[65v3]voṁ lanaṁṅ ika denira, rara hika hulihakna mariṁ rarane, maniḥ yen pada kaR̥pe [SH] rara hika lavan· raramane lanaṁ{-e}, voṁ lanaṁ kasor kulane hika, ha{vo}/veḥ\ha tukona riṁ ba[65v4]paniṁ rara hika, javi kapatəh arrane,,
      4060@@B (le2): riṁ voṁṅ abcik kula kajatine, hiṅuṅgahan deniṁ rara, tan do- [49-11]ṣanana kaṁṅ iṅuṅgahan ika: denira saṅ amava bhūmī,, 0 ,, riṁ voṁṅ a- ⌈ [49-12]sor kajatine, sor kulane, hiṅuṅgahan iṁ rara menak kaja:tine, pisa- [49-13]hakna rara hika la:van kaṁ den-uṅgahi, vuvus apisaḥ, takonana ⌈ [49-14]denira voṅ-atuhane rara hika:, yen dudu kaR̥pe mantu vo- [49-15]ṅ lanaṁ sor kulane hika:, patenana voṅ lanaṅ ika: denira, rara [49-16]hika hulihakna mariṁ raramane maniḥ, yen paḍa kaR̥pe rara hika: [49-17]la:van rara:mane lanaṁ voṁ lanaṁ kaṁ sor kulane hika:, haveha [49-18]<margin hand="roman">252</margin>tukon mariṁ bapaniṁ rara hika:, javi kapatəṁ harane,, 0 ,,
      .@@C (le3): riṁ voṁṅ abcikula kajatine [23-09], hiṅuṅgahan deniṁ rara, tan doṣanana kaṁ hiṅuṅgahan ika, [23-10]de saṁ prabhū,, 0 ,, riṁ voṁṅ asor kajatine, hiṅuṅgahan deniṁ [23-11]rara menaka:jatine, pisahakna rara hikā lavan kaṁ den-u- [23-12]ṅgahi, huvus pva pisaḥ, takonana denira voṁṅ-atuhane [23-13]rara hika:, yen ḍudu kaR̥pe mantu voṁ lanaṅ asor kajati- [23-14]ne hika:, patenana voṁ lanaṅ ika: denira, rara hika [23-15]hulihakna: mariṁ raramane maniḥ, yen apaḍa kaR̥pe rara hi- [23-16]ka: lavan raramane lanaṁ, voṁ lanaṁ kaṁ sor kulane hika [23-17], haveha tukon mariṁ bapa:niṁ rara hika:, javi kapatə- [23-18]<margin hand="roman">252</margin>harane,, 0 ,,
      .@@L (lo1): -
      .@@M (ma1): -
      .@@X (ja1): still unidentified
      4065@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ abcikula kajatine iṅuṅgahan deniṅ rarā, tan doṣanana kaṅ iṅuṅgahan ikā, denira saṅ amava bhumi. riṅ voṅ asor kajatine, sor kulane, iṅuṅgahan iṅ rarā paramenakajatine, pisahakəna rarā ikā lavan kaṅ den-uṅgahi, huvus apisah, takonana denira voṅ-atuvane rarā ikā, yen dudu karəpe mantu voṅ lanaṅ sor kulane ikā, patenana voṅ lanaṅ ikā denira, rarā ikā ulihakəna mariṅ rarāmane, manih yen paḍa karəpe rarā ikā lavan rarāmane lanaṅ, voṅ lanaṅ kasor kulane ikā, aveha tukon mariṅ bapaniṅ rarā ikā, javikapatəharane.
      .@@H (edH): -
      .-->

      4140 <!--
      .@@A (le1): ri(ṁ) vadon amamaraṁṅ akon aharaṁ matra[SH]ne vadon·, lavan hana vo vadon sapad{i} ulurran lavan voṁ vado{lu}n luṅha hatatarvan iṅi[66r1]ṅgahakən deniṁ voṁ lan{i}aṁ, maniḥ hana vo(ṁ) vadon aveḥ dunuṅan iṁ von luṅha:,, ri voṁ vadon maṅkana, katlu hiku dəṇda:nən pataṁ tali denira saṅ amava bumi,,
      .@@B (le2): riṁ ⌈ [49-19]voṁ vadon amamarah akon alakiha riṁ mitrane vadon·, lava- [49-20]n hana voṁ vadon sapaḍulūran lavan voṁ vadon luṅha hatatavan i- [49-21]ṅiṅgatakən deniṁ voṁ lanaṁ, manih ana voṁ vadon aveḥ dunuṅa- [49-22]n iṁ voṁ vadon luṅha:, riṁ voṁ vadon maṅkana, katlu hika: ḍəṇḍanə- [49-23]<margin hand="roman">253</margin>n pataṁ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmī,, 0 ,,
      .@@C (le3): riṁ voṁ vadon amamaraṁ hakon alakiha riṁ [23-19]mitrane vadon·, lavan hana voṁ vadon sapaduluran la- [23-20]van· voṁ vadon luṅha: hatatavan· hiṅiṅgatakәn deniṁ [23-21]voṁ lanaṁ, manih ana voṁ vadon aveḥ dunuṅan iṁ voṁ va- ⌈ [23-22]don luṅha \ha/tatavan·, riṁ voṁ vadon maṅkana katlu hika: ḍəṇḍa [23-23]<margin hand="roman">168</margin>nən pataṁ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmi,, 0 ,,
      .@@L (lo1): -
      4145@@M (ma1): -

      .@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ vadon amaraṅ, akon amaraṅa mitrane vadon, lavan hana voṅ vadon sapadaluran lavan voṅ vadon luṅhā atatavan tinutakən deniṅ voṅ lanaṅ, manih hana vadon aveh dunuṅan iṅ voṅ luṅhā, riṅ voṅ vadon maṅkana katəlu iku ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ tali denira saṅ amava bhumi.

      4225 <!--
      .@@A (le1): riṁ voṁ muṅgaḥ mariṁ pataron iṁṅ a[66r2]paturon·, tan pakone kaṁṅ adr̥ve Omaḥ, nora hameti dr̥ve {ui ma}, kevala [SH] muṅgaḥ, yen vəṅi ka:lane, vənḍanən· roṁ laka, dekira saṅ amava bumi,, yen· rahina ka:la[66r3]ne⟨⟨e⟩⟩ muṅgaḥ, dəṇda: limaṁ taṁli, yen asiṅidan· hana den-kavḍeni, dəṇda: saṅaṁ tali tluṅ ata[SH]k· yeṁn· tka sakiṁ tan vəruhe dəṇḍa: nəm tali sama:s·,, yen amarani sakiṁṅ agalake tur§[66r4]r anaṁtaṁ, taṅunus kəris·, dəṇda: salakpra,, haṅunus kəris tur aməraṁ saka, vaton· galar:ya, dəṇda roṁ lakṣa, denira saṅ amava bumi,, yeṇ da:di vicara riṁ mañjiṁṅ iṁ humaḥ maṅkana doṣane,, yen kaṁ [66v1]{ui na de}ṅ adr̥ve humaḥ tan aR̥p a[m]iṁsaraha, riṁ mañjiṁṅ iṅ umaḥ hiṁṅ ahumaḥ turr aṅunus kəris·, sakṣana vnaṁ putiyane dene kaṁṅ adr̥va humaḥ, tan vicaranən·,, 0 ,,
      .@@B (le2): riṁ voṁ muṅgaḥ mariṁ patu- ⌈ [49-24]roniṁṅ apaturon·, tan pakone kaṅ adr̥ve Omaḥ, nora ha- ⌈ [49-25]met dr̥ve, kevala muṅgaḥ yan· vṅi kalane, ḍəṇḍanən· roṁ lakṣa IMG_0682 <pb n="50"/><fw n="50" place="top-left"><num value="50">50</num></fw> [50-01]denira saṅ amava bhūmī,, yen rahina kalane muṅgaḥ, ḍəṇḍa limaṁ tali, [50-02]yen asiṅidan hana kaṁ den-kavḍeni, ḍəṇda saṅaṁ tali tluṅ atak·, ye- [50-03]n· tka sakiṁ tan vruhe dəṇḍa nəm tali sama:s·, yen amarani sakiṁ gala- ⌈ [50-04]ke, tūr anaṁtaṁ haṅunus kəris· ḍəṇḍa salakṣa, haṅunus kəris tur amə- [50-05]raṁ śaka, vaton·, galar·, ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhū- [50-06]mī, yen dadi vicara riṁ mañjiṁṅ iṁ humaḥ maṅkana doṣane,, yen kaṅ adr̥- [50-07]ve humaḥ tan aR̥p avicaraha:, riṁ mañjiṁṅ iṁṅ ahumaḥhiṅ ahumaḥ tur aṅu- [50-08]nus kəris·, sasa:kṣaṇna vnaṁ patihane denikaṅ adr̥ve humaḥ, tan vica:ra- [50-09]<margin hand="roman">254</margin>nən·,, 0 ,,
      .@@C (le3): riṁ voṁ mu- [53-03]ṅgaḥ riṁ paturon iṅ apaturon·, tan pakone kaṅ adu- [53-04]ve humaḥ, nora hamet· dr̥ve, kevala muṅgaḥ, ḍə- [53-05]ṇḍanən roṁ lakṣa denira saṁṅ amava bhūmmi, yen rahina: [53-06]kalane muṅgaḥ, ḍəṇḍa limaṁ tali, yen aṣiṅidan· A- [53-07]na den-kavdeni, ḍəṇḍa saṅa tali tluṁṅ atak·, yen təka: sa- [53-08]kiṁ tan-vəruhe, ḍəṇḍa: nəm tali samas·, yen amaraṇi sakiṁ [53-09]galake, tūr anaṁtaṁ, haṅunus kris·, tūrr amraṁ saka:, vato- [53-10]n·, gala:r, ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa denira saṁṅ amava bhumi, yen da- [53-11]di vicara riṁ mañjiṁṅ iṁ Umah iṅ ahumaḥ, maṅkanaṁ doṣane. [53-12]yen tan aR̥p kaṅ adr̥ve humaḥ vicaraha riṁ mañjiṅ i Umaḥheṅ ahu- [53-13]maḥ, tūrr anunus kris sasakṣaṇna:, vnaṁ patihane dene kaṅ a- [53-14]<margin hand="roman">43</margin>dr̥ve humaḥ, tan vicaranən·,, 0 ,,
      .@@L (lo1): -
      4230@@M (ma1): -
      .@@X (ja1): kunәṁ muṅgaḥ riṁ paturon iṁ hapaturon·, tan pakone [34v-07]kaṅ adr̥ve humaḥ, nora hamet· dr̥ve, kevala muṅgaḥ, ⌈ [34v-08]n vəṅi kalane, ḍanḍanən roṁ lakṣa denira saṅ a:mava bumi [34v-09], yen rahina kalane muṅgaḥ, ḍaṇḍa limaṁ tali, yen asaṅiḍan· [34v-10]hana den-kavәdini, ḍaṇḍa saṅaṁ tali tluṁṅ atak·, yen tә sa- [34v-11]kiṁ tan vruhe, ḍaṇḍa nəm tali ḍaṇḍa sala- [34v-12]kṣa, haṅunus kəris·, turr aməraṁ saka vaton galar, ḍaṇḍa roṁ lakṣa [34v-13]denira saṅ amava bumi yen· dudi vicara, mañjiṁṅ ahumaḥ, maṅkaṇa ⌈ [34v-14]doṣane, yen· kaṅ adr̥ve humaḥ, tan aR̥p mica:raha, riṁ ma- [34v-15]ñjiṁṅ iṁ humaḥhiṁṅ ahumaḥ, muṅgaḥ mariṁ paturon·, tur a:ṅunus kəri- [34v-16]s·, sakṣaṇa vnaṁ patiyane, denira kaṁṅ a:dr̥ve humaḥ, vi- [34v-17]cara: ,, 0 ,, 0 ,, // 0 //
      .@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ muṅgah mariṅ pat⟨u⟩ron iṅ apaturon tan pakone kaṅ adr̥ve umah, nora ameti dr̥ve, kevala muṅgah, yen vəṅi kālane, ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi, yen rahina kālane muṅgah ḍəṇḍa limaṅ tali, yen asiṅidan hana den-kavədeni, ḍəṇḍa saṅaṅ tali təluṅ atak, yen təka sakiṅ tan-vəruhe ḍəṇḍa nəm tali samās, yen amarani sakiṅ agalake tur anaṅtaṅ, tan aṅunus kəris, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa aṅunus kəris, tur aməraṅ saka, vaton, galar, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi, yen dadi vicāra riṅ mañjiṅ iṅ umah maṅkana doṣane, yen kaṅ adr̥ve umah tan harəp amicāraha riṅ mañjiṅ iṅ umah iṅ aumah, tur aṅunus kerəs sākṣaṇa vənaṅ patihane dene kaṅ adr̥ve umah, tan vicaranən.
      .@@H (edH): -
      . -->
      4235<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #ja1 #edj -->
      .<p n="253">
      . <app>
      . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #edj">riṅ voṅ</lem>
      4240 <rdg wit="#ja1">kunәṅ</rdg>
      . </app>
      . muṅgah
      . <app>
      . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #edj">mariṅ</lem>
      4245 <rdg wit="#le3 #ja1">riṅ</rdg>
      . </app>
      . paturoniṅ apaturon, tan pakone kaṅ
      . <app>
      . <lem wit="#ja1 #edj">adr̥ve umah</lem>
      4250 <rdg wit="#le1 #le2">adr̥ve <seg type="highlight">o</seg>maḥ</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#le3" cause="lexical">ad<seg type="highlight">u</seg>ve umah</rdg>
      . </app>
      . , nora
      . <app>
      4255 <lem wit="#le2 #le3 #ja1">amet</lem>

      .@@A (le1): riṁ voṁ tinambaṁ dene lakide, kaṁ la[66v2]naṁ luṅha, hamet· darmma:, hataki-taki Ulaḥ hayu, hantinən ḍene kaṁ vadon· voṁlu [SH] tahun·, yen luṅha: haṅaji hamet· śa:stra, yan tekna nəm tahan·, yen luṅha: hadagaṁ, halayar· [66v3] , hamet arttha, hantekna sapuluḥ tahun·, yen luṅha: harabi yan te{*}kna tluṁ tahan·, ⌈[SH]yenora hakikirim ka lanaṁ riṁ rabine hika:, vnaṁ halakiya riṁṅ len·, riṁ voṁ vadon tinambaṁ [66v4] ne lakine, kaṁ lanaṁ hapapa:ran· hanḍuradega, hantinəṁn pataṁ hun· dene voṁ vadon ika:, nora tka pataṁ tahun·, vnaṁ paṁ vadon alakiha riṁ len·,,
      .@@B (le2): riṁ voṁ tinambaṁ deniṁ lakine, kaṅ lanaṁ luṅha hamet ḍarmma, ha- [50-10]taki-taki Ulaḥ rahayu, Antinən dene kaṁ vadon· voṁluṁ tahun·, [50-11]yen luṅha: haṅaji, hamet sastra, hantekna nəm tahun·, yen luṅha: hadagaṁ, [50-12]halayar·, hamet harttha:, hantekna sapuluḥ tavun·, yen luṅha: harabi, [50-13]hantekna tluṁ tahun·, yen ora hakikirim kaṁ lanaṁṅ ika riṁ rabine, vnaṁ [50-14]halakiha riṁ voṁ len·,, riṁ voṁ vadon tinambaṁ dene lakine, kaṁ la- [50-15]naṁṅ apaparan·, handuradeṣa:, hantinən pataṁ tahun· dene voṁ va- [50-16]don ika:, nora tka pataṁ tahun·, vnaṁ kaṁ vadon alakiha riṁ len·,,

      . <!--
      .@@A (le1): riṅ voṁ vadon alaki riṁ len·, ⌈[67r1]yen kaṁ lanaṁ mula hilaṁ, ma:ti riṁ paraneku, karuṅa lumaku viku, kumiṁ tan kavaśa riṁ saṅgama, makadi vudug ha{rane}, yen maṅkana tiṅkahiṁ voṁ lanaṅ ika, kaṁ vadon· vnaṁṅ alakiya riṁ len·,,

      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #edj -->
      4525<p n="255">
      .riṅ voṅ vadon alaki riṅ len, yen kaṅ lanaṅ mula hilaṅ, māti
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#le2">riṅ parane kunәṅ</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le1" cause="subtractive">riṁ paraneku</rdg>
      4530 <rdg wit="#edj">riṅ parane</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#le3">kunәṅ</rdg>
      .</app>
      .,
      .<app>
      4535 <lem wit="#le2 #le3 #edj">karuṅu</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le1">karuṅa</rdg>
      .</app>
      .lumaku
      .<app>
      4540 <lem wit="#le1 #edj">viku</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le2" cause="lexical">hajar-ajar</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#le3" cause="additive">viku, hajar-ajar</rdg>
      .</app>
      ., kumiṅ tan kavaśa riṅ saṅgama, makādi vuḍug
      4545<app>
      . <lem wit="#le3 #edj">larane</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le1 #le2">arane</rdg>
      .</app>
      ., yen maṅkana tiṅkahiṅ
      4550<app>
      . <lem wit="#le1 #edj">voṅ lanaṅ ikā</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le3">lanaṅ</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#le2">voṅ lanaṅ</rdg>
      .</app>
      4555, kaṅ vadon vənaṅ
      .<app>
      . <lem wit="#le1 #le3 #edj">alakiya</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le2">halakiha-rabi</rdg>
      .</app>
      4560riṅ len.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #edj -->
      . <!--
      .
      . -->
      4565<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #ja1 #edj -->
      .<p n="256">
      .riṅ voṅ lanaṅ yen edan-edanən, yen ahriṅ aṅgirih larane, yen ayan larane, kumiṅ tan lanaṅ vəkasan elik kaṅ vadon, antinən təluṅ tahun, voṅ lanaṅ ikā dene rabine, konən aṅulatana tamba yen tan varas iṅ təluṅ tahun kaṅ lanaṅ ikā, tan doṣanana voṅ vadon ikā, yen alakiya riṅ len, sapanukune, tan muliya mariṅ voṅ lanaṅ ikā, aṅanti səminiṅ paṅ akiṅ arane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="257">
      4570riṅ voṅ vadon elik iṅ lakine, <app>
      .<lem>antinak</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">antinən</rdg>
      .</app> satahun dene lakine, yen malər elik riṅ satahun voṅ vadon ikā, amaṅsulakəna tukon anikəla piṇḍo amañcal turon arane.</p>
      .
      4575<p n="258">
      .<supplied reason="omitted">svyaṅ</supplied>? yan saṅ brāhmaṇa arabi papat, sahos kanakṣabrāhmaṅabmakā, dumana savəlasan uga, tan vehana sapadumaniṅ kaṅ mətu sakiṅ brāhmaṇī, sakiṅ kṣatriyā, sakiṅ voṅ tani, sakiṅ <unclear>voṅ</unclear> adagaṅ, tan paḍakəna, maṅkana dharmaniṅ saratka.</p>
      .
      .<p n="259">
      .hana ta vətuniṅ anak rovəlas ucapən maṅke <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="90"/>
      4580 liṅ bhaṭāra <app>
      .<lem>madu</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">manu</rdg>
      .</app> mavarah riṅ janma kabeh, iṅətakəna sapatiṅ ambatgave, nənəm kehiṅ anak, vehana dr̥ve kaliliran, kaṅ nənəmaniṅ anak tan vehana dr̥ve kaliliran, paran ta patuṅgal-tuṅgalane? anakiṅ ragisakan rarehan duk paḍa jajaka rara, olihiṅ ramā-reṇa amaraṅ, rabi kapiṅroniṅ aomah-omah, huvus akiṅa tuvi, <app>
      .<lem>bh</lem>
      4585<rdg wit="#edj">ṅ</rdg>
      .</app>aṅiṅ tan hana pocapane hala, tan pavada, tur kinon alakiha deniṅ rāma-reṇane, anak pavevehiṅ sanak, kadaṅ varga, anak pinalaku anakiṅ voṅ len, anak olihiṅ rabi abibisan, kinon deniṅ laki, saṅkane anak-anak, anakiṅ voṅ len <app>
      .<lem>debuñjal</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">den-buñcal</rdg>
      .</app> pinupu-pupu iṅaku anak, <app>
      4590<lem>hinubaṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">iku kaṅ</rdg>
      .</app> nənəm, vənaṅ amet<unclear>a</unclear> dr̥ve <supplied reason="omitted">li</supplied> kaliliran. əndi ta kaṅ nənəm<unclear>a</unclear>ne <unclear>nora</unclear> vənaṅ ameta dr̥ve kaliliran? anak səḍəṅiṅ rarā tan kasapekṣan kaṅ pinakabapa, anak casaruban akehanḍuha, anakiṅ voṅ vadon apəpəgatan lavan lakine tumuli alaki riṅ len, mahu kavorran voṅ vadon ikā, mati lakine kaṅ piṇḍo, tan alavas muli<unclear>h</unclear> r<unclear>iṅ</unclear> lakine mula anutugadən dadihanirara ikā, anak<supplied reason="omitted">iṅ</supplied> olihiṅ atuku, anakiṅ voṅ len amalaku iṅaku anak, anakiṅ kavula sor kavoṅane iṅaku anak.</p>
      .
      .<p n="260">
      4595yen anak paveveh, lavan anakiṅ voṅ len ginave anak, vehana satəṅah dum-dumane, tan milu kaduman-duman riṅ aṅaku anak, yenora <unclear>h</unclear>ana anak təmən, vənaṅ i<unclear>ka</unclear>ṅ anak paveveh, anakiṅ len <unclear>g</unclear>inave anak, aṅalapa siṅ sadr̥veniṅ aṅaku anak.</p>
      .
      .<p n="261">
      .riṅ dr̥ve vinevehakən iṅ rabine deniṅ lakine, manih riṅ anak vineha<unclear>n</unclear> dr̥ve deniṅ bapa, duk lagi huripe kasapekṣan deniṅ anak-rabi jīvane arane, riṅ dr̥ve maṅkana tan <app>
      .<lem>m</lem>
      4600<rdg wit="#edj">v</rdg>
      .</app>ənaṅ udalən deniṅ palara sanak kaṅ mətu <app>
      .<lem>sana</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">sakiṅ</rdg>
      .</app> rabi len, kaṅ vinehan j<unclear>i</unclear>vadana, <app>
      4605<lem>huta</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">uga</rdg>
      .</app> viśeṣa riṅ dr̥ve paveveh ikā. <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="91"/>
      .</p>
      .
      4610<p n="262">tiṅkahiṅ putra riṅ pisis, varahakəna patutuṅgalan ikaṅ arane, kāyavr̥ddhi, voṅ a<supplied reason="omitted">p</supplied>mutrani aṅkokiṅave, abotadaṅan, kālavr̥ddhi voṅ
      .<app><lem>ahutaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#ms">ahukaṅ</rdg></app>
      .amətoni naṅ<supplied reason="omitted">an</supplied>kən vulan,
      .<app><lem>karaka</lem><rdg wit="#edj">kāritā vr̥ddhi</rdg></app>
      .voṅ ahutaṅ tinuduhan gave,
      4615cakravr̥ddhi voṅ ah<unclear>u</unclear>taṅ anikəl aṅguluṅ putrane, papat kehiṅ kalāntara <app>
      .<lem>putraniṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#ms">kutra-</rdg>
      .</app> pisis, maṅkana yenujar iṅ śāstra.</p>
      .
      4620<p n="263">
      .tiṅkahiṅ putraniṅ pisis, aputra naṅkən vulan hiṅane riṅ pisis <app>
      .<lem>sevu</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#ms">pevu</rdg>
      .</app> aputraha roṅ daśa, pataṅ daśa, limaṅ daśa, maṅkana putraniṅ pisisniṅ sevu naṅkən vulan deniṅ pradana amutrakakən, anuta varṇaniṅ ahutaṅ.</p>
      4625
      .<p n="264">
      .. . katuturakəna ikā, kāyikā vr̥ddhi, kālikā vr̥ddhi <app>
      .<lem>kāritā</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#ms">karika</rdg>
      4630</app> vr̥ddhi, cakravr̥ddhi, ləvih ika, śikhavr̥ddhi aputra pipilan, bhogavr̥ddhi aputra paṅan, aṅupaya siṅ enak, vinehakən iṅ gənahe ahutaṅ salviraniṅ putra, tan aṅəloṅa pavita<supplied reason="omitted">ṅa</supplied>n.</p>
      .<!--%ed: ikā|-->
      .
      .<p n="265">
      .maṅkana manih riṅ <supplied reason="omitted">pi</supplied>hutaṅ pisis, <app>
      4635<lem>panikəle</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#ms">panipəle</rdg>
      .</app> piṅro, dodot anikəl piṅ təlu uga, yan hutaṅ pari anikəl piṅ lima uga, yan ahutaṅ kombala, ahutaṅ tutuggaṅan, ahutaṅ guci, yen riṅ nəm tahun anikəl piṅ lima uga, maṅkana kramane yen anut śāsananiṅ ahutaṅ.</p>
      .
      .<p n="266">
      4640kunəṅ yen ahutaṅ ajaran vadon, kəbo vadon, sapi vadon, yen təka riṅ luṅ tahun tuṅgal muliha roro; iku kramane.</p>
      .
      .<p n="267">
      .riṅ bhukten pucaṅ, riṅ tisan, badeg, savalan, vovohan sakalviriṅ vovohan, yen olihiṅ am<unclear>i</unclear>śeṣa bhukti<unclear>,</unclear> bhukti kinavaśakən iṅ len, sakiṅ kəlare, kaṅ adr̥ve bhukti viniśeṣa ika ta kaṅ aṅgaduhi surat pikukuh akeh sākṣine duk vinehan piyagəma<unclear>n</unclear> dene kaṅ aveh, aṅhiṅ kinavaśakən dene kaṅ amiśeṣa bhukti ikā, sakiṅ tan kavaśaniṅ kaṅ adr̥ve bhukti, den-ḍahut <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="92"/>
      . tan kaḍahut, aṅhiṅ malər anali-nali, ika ta arane bhukti śakti dene kaṅ amiśe<unclear>ṣa</unclear> ambhukti arane bhukti<supplied reason="omitted">n</supplied> tan yukti liṅniṅ śāstra maṅkana.</p>
      4645
      .<p n="268">
      .apan iṅ <app>
      .<lem>bhukti</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">bhūmi</rdg>
      4650</app> bhinukti deniṅ len <app>
      .<lem>kinvavuhan</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">kinavruhan</rdg>
      .</app> deniṅ adr̥ve bhūmi<supplied reason="omitted">.</supplied> riṅ roṅ puluh tahun lavase bhinukti deniṅ para mənəṅ tan paṅucap kaṅ adr̥ve <app>
      .<lem>bhukti</lem>
      4655<rdg wit="#edj">bhūmi</rdg>
      .</app>, yan maṅkana hilaṅ dr̥vene bhūmine, maṅkana <app>
      .<lem>hinaṅ</lem>
      .<rdg wit="#edj">ikaṅ</rdg>
      .</app> pavevehira s<unclear>i</unclear>ṅ vatək dāna, bhuktinən deniṅ voṅ len, akaraṇa sakiṅ valate hilaṅ pavevehira saṅ
      4660aveveh, yadyapin ikaṅ <supplied reason="omitted">riṅ</supplied> mas tuvi, vinalat iṅ para, sakiṅ vədine amanəpakuha riṅ mas kaṅ den-valat deniṅ voṅ ikā, mənəṅ tan paṅucap kaṅ adr̥ve riṅ sadaśa tahun lavase, hilaṅ ikaṅ samaṅkana.</p>
      .
      .<p n="269">
      .yen hana dr̥ve <supplied reason="omitted">savadnaniṅ dr̥ve</supplied> sarupavarṇaniṅ dr̥ve, den-tiṅgalakən dene kaṅ adr̥ve, rakṣanə<unclear>n</unclear> denira saṅ prabhu adr̥ve bhūmi rumuhun lavasira aṅrakṣaha təluṅ tahun, yen livat sakerika ikaṅ dr̥ve <supplied reason="omitted">riṅ təluṅ tahun</supplied> petən deni<unclear>ra</unclear> saṅ amava bhūmi, apan dr̥vyanira ikā.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->

      .@@A (le1): maniḥ tiṅkaḥhi kavula, saṅkale dadi kavula, haṅavula dene katavan·,, [70v3] haṅavula deniṁ paṅan·,, haṅavula duk mahu mətu sakiṁ raramane vadon mətu riṅ umahe gustine, kavula holiḥhiṁ hatuku,, kavula paveveh i voṁ, kavula kalili[71r1]ran śaki rarama lanaṁ vadon·, haṅavula de{d}ne kadəṇḍa, pipisaṅkaniṁ dadi kavulani(ṁ) vo(ṁ), riṁ kavula maṅkana ta kabeḥ, yen haR̥p ṣaha sakiṁ gustine, Atəbusa hutaṁ rumuhun·,

      . <lem wit="#le1 #ja1 #edj">denira saṅ amava</lem>
      . <rdg wit="#le2">deniṁ saṅ amava</rdg>
      . <rdg wit="#le3">de saṁṅ saṅ adr̥ve</rdg>
      .</app>
      4885bhūmi.</p>
      .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #ja1 #edj -->
      . <!--
      .@@A (le1): riṁ voṁ hadol kavula tan yogya doL̥n·, tan kahaR̥pe {n}dḍinol·, den-viśeṣa dene kaṁ hadol·, dəṇḍanən ṣalakṣa kaṁṅ adol·, denira saṁṅ amava bhumi,, 0 ,,
      .@@B (le2): riṁ voṅ adol kavula ta- [54-04]n yogya doL̥n· tan kahaR̥pe dinol·, den-viśepa dene kaṅ a⌈ [54-05]<margin hand="roman">274</margin> dol·, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa riṁ kaṅ adol· denira saṅ ama/va\ bhūmī ,, 0 ,,
      4890@@C (le3): riṁ ⌈ [68-10]voṁṅ adol kavula tan yogya doL̥n·, tan kahaR̥pe dino- [68-11]l·, den-viśeśa dene kaṅ adol·, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa kaṅ ado- [68-12]l· de śaṁ mava bhūmi,, 0 ,,
      .@@L (lo1): -
      .@@M (ma1): -
      .@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁ haṅa:dol kavula tan ogya doL̥n·, tan kahaR̥pe di- [25v-21]nol·, ḍaṇḍanən salakṣa kaṅ a:ṅadol·, denira saṅ a:mava [25v-22]bhumi,, 0 ,,
      .@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ adol kavula tan yogya dolən, tan kaharəpe dinol, den-viśeṣa dene kaṅ adol, ḍəṇḍanən salakṣa kaṅ adol denira saṅ amava bhumi.

      4935 <!--
      .@@A (le1): [71v1] ri voṁ hananambani nora vəruḥ riṅ osadda, nora {hə} vəruḥ hama{u}ntraprayoga, tan vəruḥ tahvaniṁ lara, haṅalap ṭa ya həbaṅ-həbaṁ riṁ voṁṅ agəriṁṅika, riṁ voṁ maṅkana paddakna lavan {va} mali [71v2] , liñok riṁ voṁ haṇna:nambani maṅkana, yen hana[IMG_1249 top]nambani hupasara tan varas havkasan ma[SH]ni, dəṇda:nən pataṁ tali təluṁṅ atak·, yen hananambani voṁ tan varas anuli mati dənda salakṣa, [71v3] yen hanambani riṁ sa bramana tan varas anuli mati, dəṇda: roṁ lakṣa de rara saṅ amava bhumi, yen mati kaṁ den-tambanin·, vnaṁ patenana kaṁ hana\m/bani hika, denira saṅ amava bhumi, maṅkana pagəhiṁ darmma[71v4]śasanani samavarnna,, 0 ,,
      .@@B (le2): riṁ⌈ [54-06]voṅ ananambani nora vəruh iṅ oṣaḍa, nora vəruh iṁ mantra prayogha, tan və- [54-07]ruḥ tatvaniṁ lara, haṅalap ta həbaṅ-həbaṁ riṁ voṅ agəriṁṅ ika:. riṁ voṁ maṅka:na, pa- [54-08]ḍakna lavan maliṁ, liñok iṅ ananambanin maṅkana. yen anambani hupasa:ra [54-09]tan varas havkasan mati, ḍəṇḍanən pataṁ tali tluṅ atak·. yen hanambani⌈ [54-10]voṁ tan varas anūli ma:ti, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa. yen hanambani riṁ saṁ bra:hmaṇa, [54-11]tan varas anūli ma:ti, ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa denira saṅ amava: bhūmī, yen ma- [54-12]ti kaṁ den-tambani, vnaṁ patenana kaṅ anambani Ika: denira saṅ amava bhū- [54-13]<margin hand="roman">275</margin>mī, maṅkana pagəhiṁ ḍarmma śaṣananiṁ saṁṅ amava bhūmī,, 0 ,,
      .@@C (le3): riṁ voṁ [52-12]ṅ ananambani nora vəruh iṅ oṣadha, nora vəruh iṅ mantr̥ prayo- [52-13]ga:, tan vəruḥ tatvaniṁ lara:, haṅalap ta həbaṁ-həbaṁ, riṁ voṁṅ agriṁ- [52-14]ṅ ika:, riṁ voṁ maṅkana:, paḍakna lavan maliṁ, liñok iṅ anana:mba- [52-15]ni maṅkana:. yen hanambani hupasara:, tan varas·, havkasan mati, [52-16]ḍəṇḍanən pataṁ tali tluṅ atak·. yen hanambani voṁ tan varas hanu- [52-17]li mati, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa. yen hanambani riṁ saṁ brahmaṇna:, tan va- [52-18]ras· hanuli mati, ḍəṇḍa roṁ lakṣa de saṁṅ amava bhūmi, yen ma:- [52-19]ti kaṁ den-tambani, vnaṁ patenana kaṅ ana:mbani hika:, de saṁṅ amava bhū- [52-20]<margin hand="roman">244</margin>mi, maṅkana patәhaniṁ śaśananiṁ samavarṇna:.
      .@@L (lo1): -
      4940@@M (ma1): -
      .@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁṅ a:nambani nora vəruḥ riṁ husada nora vəruḥ riṁ mantra prayo- [25v-24]ga:, tan vəruḥ tan vəruḥ riṁ tatvaniṁ lara, haṅəbaṁ riṁ voṁṅ agəriṁ hika, [25r-01]riṁ voṁ maṅkana:, padakna lavan maliṁ, liñokaṅa:nanambanana maṅkana, yen anambani vusaharaniṁ varas·, vkasan mati ḍaṇḍa- [25r-03]nən pataṁ tali tluṅ a:tak·, yenambaniṁ voṁ tan varas a- [25r-04]nuli mati, ḍaṇḍa salakṣa yen ana:mbani saṁ brahmaṇa:, ta- [25r-05]n varas anuli mati, ḍaṇḍa salakṣa denira saṅ a:mava bhumi, [25r-06]yen mati kaṁ den-tambani, vnaṁ patenana kaṅ a:nambani hika, [25r-07]denira saṅ a:mava bhumi, maṅkaṇa: darmane, sasamaniṁ sa- [25r-08]mavarṇna:,, 0 ,,
      .@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ anambani nora vəruh riṅ osadha, nora vəruh amantra prayoga, tan vəruh tahvaniṅ lara, aṅalap ta ya paṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ riṅ voṅ agəriṅ ikā, riṅ voṅ maṅkana paḍakna lavan maliṅ liñok riṅ voṅ anambani maṅkana, yen anambani upacāra tan varas avəkasan mati ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ tali təluṅ atak, yen hana anambani voṅ tan varas anuli mati ḍəṇḍa salakṣa, yen anambani riṅ saṅ brāhmaṇa tan varas anuli mati ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi, yen mati kaṅ den-tambani, vənaṅ patenana kaṅ anambani ikā, denira saṅ amava bhumi, maṅkana pagehiṅ dharma, śāsananiṅ samavarṇa.

      5135<div type="bibliography">
      . <p>First edited by Jonker mainly from Le1. Edited again by Hoadley &amp; Hooker from Lo. The text of Jonker’s edition OCR-ed and checked by Arlo Griffiths &amp; Timothy Lubin. Based thereon, this digitial edition was prepared by Nurmalia Habibah with collation of eight witnesses.</p>

      bhaṭāra Lo
      dhttara EdHH       amirәṅvani Lo
      amireng vani EdHH       paṅarcana Lo
      Praṅar/a/n Tuna EdHH       mavr̥ddhālus tan avamana, em.
      maredḍālus tan avāmanā, Lo
      mareddha lustana vamana,       EdHH       cavuhiṅ rasa kayogyan, Lo
      tuvuh iṅ rasa kayogan, EdHH       śāstra EdHH
      śāsra Lo      aṅudokən Lo
      aṅudekən EdHH       [tan]
      malayokən tvas jajalukən, Lo
      malajokən tvasta jalukən, EdHH       [tan] avrə bot Lo
      avrabot EdHH       lobha Lo
      lontar EdHH       kimburu, yeku Lo
      kimbura, jeku EdHH       enaknya Lo
      enakəna EdHH       kalulutanya Lo
      kalulu tan EdHH       tathāpi ya em.
      katapiya Lo EdHH       yan Lo
      jen EdHH       -sthitiṅ Lo
      -sthisi ṅ EdHH       prayoga Lo
      prayogya EdHH       anibani Lo
      ṅibani EdHH       ya Lo
      ja EdHH       skar manahiṅ bala Lo
      pkarmana iṅ bala EdHH       polatan ta ṅlalari Lo
      volatan ta ṅgalari EdHH       avdy anon iṅ kayu maḍəg Lo
      avdaneniṅ kaju maḍəg EdHH       an sumendhe Lo
      anpu mendhe EdHH       parantunanya Lo
      parantun EdHH       manuṅgaṅi ratha vihikan aśvamedhaniṅ asarati Lo
      manuṅgaṅira tavihi kanasva Medhaṅ iṅ ṅasarati EdHH       harohara Lo
      ta Wetara EdHH       andhəlira EdHH
      taṇḍəlira Lo      amaṅku Lo
      ta maṅku EdHH       [tan] Lo
      EdHH       an Lo
      ana EdHH       huñcar̥n Lo
      hunturən EdHH       hayo Lo
      ajo EdHH       aṅemplag-emplagan em.
      aṅamplag-amplagәn Lo
      aṅamplagan-plagәn       EdHH       mahābhārālita siṅhit sūśvareṅ akṣara Lo
      maha dharalita siṅgit susvare ṅakṣara EdHH       riṅa-riṅanən den-asriṅ sisiriṅən pisiṅgihniṅ akveh Lo
      riṅ ariṅanən densriṅ siriṅen sisiṅganih ṅakveh EdHH       marapvan [tan] vyarthan kaparibhaveṅ kleśaniṅ aśarīra em. Lo
      mavvenvyar tan kapariba voṅ kleśani śarīra EdHH       pūrvāḍi EdHH
      parvvaḍḍi Lo      athavā kahīnan tarka em.
      aṣava kahinan tarka Lo
      asavaka hinantharka       EdHH       atrap aṇḍa-uṇḍiniṅ Lo
      atrapan dhahub deniṅ EdHH       kavigrahā Lo
      kavigrah EdHH       tinurun em.
      sinurun Lo EdHH       sinikəp pva ya Lo
      sinikəp vaya EdHH       tatvādyātmika Lo
      tatvad tmika EdHH       sumiriṅātagu-tagu Lo
      sumiriṅ tagu-tagu EdHH       rahayu Lo
      rahyu EdHH       pahenak Lo
      sahenak EdHH       pan aṅuñcarәna Lo
      padaṅun turena EdHH       saṅkṣepanya norm. Lo
      saṅ pesanya EdHH       rәp sәṅgunən añcik Lo
      reppәṅgubən antik EdHH       aprābha- Lo
      aprāṇa- EdHH       lubdha Lo
      lunda EdHH       -doṣa Lo
      -deśa EdHH       tan em.
      om. Lo EdHH       -doṣa Lo
      -deśa EdHH       den-anular rasa, kaliṅanya Lo
      om. EdHH
      The omission in Hoadley and Hooker’s edition is likely due to saut du même au même, where the eye skipped from the first occurrence of ya in paṅliṅ ya to the second ya in kaliṅanya, leading to loss of the intervening text.      priṅga tīkṣṇaniṅ asayah abrat Lo

      hasamittha Le3 Le1 (larger gap)      saparane Le1 Le3 EdJ EdHH
      om. Le2 Le1 (larger gap)      lavan Le1 Le3 EdJ EdHH
      om. Le3 Le1 (larger gap)      riṅ Le1 Le2 Le3 Lo EdJ EdHH
      iṅ Ma Ja      iku ta Le2 Le3 Lo Ma Ja EdJ EdHH
      iku aṣṭaduṣṭa harane Le1       kaṅ lilima Le1 EdJ
      kalilima Le2 Ja
      kalima       Le3 Lo Ma
      kaṅ lima       EdHH
      None of the variant readings that appear in this segment affect the meaning, as all variants refer to the same idea of ‘all five as a whole’. According to OJED, lima has a variant form lilima; thus, the form kalima, which is also attested, is morphologically coherent with kalilima. The choice of kaṅ lilima in this edition is intended to maintain consistency with the form selected earlier at the beginning of this article, ensuring editorial coherence throughout.      adoṣa Le2 Le3 Lo Ma Ja EdJ EdHH
      doṣanana Le1       nora vənaṅ doṣanana pati Le2 Le3 Lo Ma EdJ EdHH
      nora vənaṅ yan doṣanana pata Ja
      om.       Le1       denira saṅ amava bhūmi. Le2 Le3 Lo Ma Ja EdJ EdHH
      om. Le1       amateni voṅ tan padoṣa, Ma Ja EdJ EdHH

      rañcananən? EdJ       añaloṅ
      añoloṅ EdJ       bhagavān rāma paraśu
      bhagavān rāma paraśu LM       riṅ voṅ aṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ , asaṅgup aveha pisis, dadi pasusuratan, huvus prasiddha gavene, duruṅ aveh paṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ, māti kaṅ aṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ , nora vənaṅ tumusa təkeṅ anake .
      riṅ voṅ haṅəbaṅ Ja
      dadine hasusuratanan       Ja
      om.       Le3 Ja
      nora tumusa       Le3
      riṅ anake       Le1 Ja
      tkan iṅ anake       Le3
      təka riṅ anake       EdJ
      lac.       Ma      riṅ voṅ aṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ Le1 Le2 Le3 Lo EdJ EdHH
      riṅ voṅ haṅəbaṅ Jalac. Ma (larger gap)      dadi pasusuratan, Le1 Le2 Le3 Lo EdJ EdHH
      dadine hasusuratanan Jalac. Ma (larger gap)      māti kaṅ aṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ Le1 Le2 Lo EdJ EdHH
      om. Le3 Jalac. Ma (larger gap)      nora vənaṅ tumusa Le1 Le2 Lo Ja EdJ EdHH
      nora tumusa Le3 lac. Ma (larger gap)      təkeṅ anake Le2 Lo EdHH
      riṅ anake Le1 Ja
      tkan iṅ anake       Le3
      təka riṅ anake       EdJ lac. Ma (larger gap)       riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ tan paveh kalāntara putra mariṅ apihutaṅ , anikəl piṅro uga hutaṅe, savuse anikəl piṅro, tan hana panahure , riṅ voṅ maṅkana anutakəna hutaṅe , dadi kavula, alavas dene anutakən dadi kavula, tan kavaśa dene anambut- gave niṅ pr̥dana , vəkasan miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, katəmu manih deniṅ pr̥dana , aveha pavadal-gave salavase tan aṅlakoni gave niṅ pr̥dana , vəkasan mati riṅ sukuniṅ gusti, anake anahura hutaṅ anikəl piṅro .
      aveḥ Le3
      putrā kalantarā       Ja (transposition, see st. )

Ma (larger gap)       riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon, anak-anak iṅ daganiṅ gusti, yen iṅ paradeśaha agәnahe , sagənahane anak-anak , iku anak vəsi arane, anakiṅ kavula satuhuk aṅavula, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita , asevakaha riṅ anakiṅ tuhan uga, kramane. riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon anak vəsi, aṅalapa hutaṅ sahutaṅe rāmane lanaṅ vadon aməpəka, atuṅgalana , den-paḍa padum-dumane , maṅkana dharmane.
